There are also three events (falling rock, the black wolf and an ammo drop) that will randomly appear at various moments to aid the player.

sample_screenshots.caption: Mission accomplished. The sheep menace has once again been vanquished!
Occasionally, you'll get help in the form of random events.
A game in progress. Each number at the top indicates a single group of sheep and how many are in that group. When a group is eliminated, it is replaced with a cloud puff.

title: Sheep Battle

description:
Super Adventurer is a 2D side-scrolling platformer in which the player controls a man who is on a mission to save a princess and defeat the demon holding her. To this end, the player has to guide the hero through the game jumping over obstacles, climbing platforms and avoiding hazards along the way. There are also various animals in each level that can harm and impede the hero.

During each level, the player can collect coins and cacti which can be used to buy and upgrade spells and abilities. By default, the player controls the hero by way of left, right and jump buttons on screen, but this can be customized as well. There is also a level editor that allows the player to design and play custom levels.
title: Super Adventurer

description:
USA Missile Defense Command is a Missile Command variant that puts the player in control of the USA's missile defence systems that protect the states from nuclear armed ballistic missiles.

The game is set during the Cold War. The Soviets have launched their nuclear missiles at the US and the player has to protect US cities from the missiles by shooting the incoming nukes down with anti ballistic missiles. During each level there are several cities to protect and only a limited amount of missiles is provided, so players must take down as many ICBM's as possible with each missile. The level ends successfully once all incoming missiles are destroyed, or in failure if all the cities are nuked.
title: USA Missile Defense Command

description:
Hexxagon is a board game, based on the Ataxx concept and similar to its DOS adaptation Hexxagon. This two-player game takes place on a board made up of hexagons. Each turn, a player can move one of his pawns two spaces away, or clone one of his pawns onto an adjacent free space. If a pawn is put down on a space adjacent to the opponent's pawns, they are turned into the player's own pawns. The goal is to have the majority of pawns once the board is filled up. Apart from a classic human-vs-human mode, the game offers three modes of human-vs-computer play, with nine difficulty levels available.

In the "puzzle" mode, the player makes his way through a series of levels in sequence, each with a different board shape and background picture. The levels are divided into chapters, each of which has the player controlling pawns of a different color. Winning a level gives the player some stars, depending on the difficulty.

In "rating" mode the player competes with the computer on a chosen board (unlocked by completing levels in puzzle mode). The game then calculates the player's Elo rating, depending on his performance.

In "zen" mode the player can play a game on any board unlocked in puzzle mode, and is able to choose the side he'll be controlling. Winning a game gives the player points depending on difficulty.

The game contains an achievement system. Getting an achievement grants the player a couple of Discs which come in handy in "rating" mode, as they allow the player to undo a number of moves without a scoring penalty.

sample_screenshots.caption: Choose where to move your pawn
Like any Ataxx clone worth it salt it has animations for moving and for converting opponent's pawns
End of a Rating game, on one of the higher difficulties

title: Hexxagon

description:
Hexxagon HD is a board game, an enhanced version of the developer's earlier Hexxagon. Just like its predecessor it takes its inspiration from the DOS Hexxagon, with the players moving and cloning their pawns around the hexagonal boards in order to transform the opponent's pawns into their own.

A number of game modes are available. In Ranking and Star Collecting mode, the player competes against the computer, unlocking new boards as he goes. Successfully completing a board in either of these modes also unlocks it for play in Rating mode and in human-vs-human games.

In Ranking mode, there are nine difficulties to choose from. Completing a board increases the player's rating, based on the difficulty level chosen. In Star Collecting mode, each board has three "star" hexes on it; the player is challenged to occupy as many stars as possible upon completing a board. Apart from adding to the player's score in this mode, collecting a minimum number of stars is necessary to access later boards. In Rating mode, the player tries to gain a high Elo rating by successfully defeating the computer opponent; the rating increases depending on the difficulty level chosen, with thirteen difficulties to choose from. There are also three modes for competing against other human players: offline play, online play against a randomly chosen opponent, or online play against an opponent from the player's Google+ Circles.

The player can compare his scores in four game modes (Ranking mode, Star Collecting mode, Rating mode and online play) with other players from all over the world. The game also contains an achievement system and in-app purchases, where money can be spent to buy gems that can disable ads or unlock all boards.

sample_screenshots.caption: The offline 2- or 3-player mode. The borders around the levels signify how many players can play on them.
Preparing to move one of our pawns
The in-game menu open. This allows you to change sound settings, undo a move, or start over.
Choosing a level in Rating mode

title: Hexxagon HD

description:
UFOs Love Cows is simple, side-scrolling game similar to Flappy Bird where the player controls an alien ship. You abduct cows and destroy human defences to get the highest possible score. You can spend abducted cows to get better ships or pilots and buy multiple boosts increasing your chance to have better score.

You control your ship using one-finger swiping; the ship follows your moves without any delay. Hovering over a cow for a while, abducts it. Getting near humans or their defences lets your ship attack them with laser beams. If you make it to the mother ship, you will receive boost that makes you indestructible and boost you for a short while.

The game allows you to abduct cows in three different areas: farmland, mines and city. They look different and the enemies and obstacles change depending on the area.
title: UFOs Love Cows

description:
In Modern Sniper, the player takes on the role of a sniper tasked with dealing with deadly mob gangs from a distance. In each of the 3D levels, the player only has a limited amount of time to eliminate all the mob henchmen, some of with are tougher to take down than others. There will also be various obstacles obstructing the player.

During the game, the player earns money which can be spent on the game's seven sniper rifles and assault rifles, all of which can have their power, magazine size, fire rate and stability upgraded.
title: Modern Sniper

description:
Viperbyte is a variant on the classic Snake game of the 1970's. The game requires two players (human vs human or human vs AI) and the goal is to be the first to achieve 100 points.

Points are scored by eating matching color hearts that randomly appear on the play field, or by eating your opponent’s body segments. As you score points, your body grows in length, which in turn can be attacked by your opponent to regain points. If your snake becomes trapped, your body segments are consumed and points are awarded to the opponent.

To successfully eat a heart, your snake color must match the heart color. If the color does not match, the heart is still consumed but the points are awarded to your opponent. You can change the color of your snake at any time. Eating hearts also awards venom, which is required to use certain abilities. The pace of the game is increased as a player approaches the winning score. To win, a player must have quick reflexes and a successful strategy in acquiring and using venom.

Venom can be used for the following abilities:* Attack Ability: charge at your opponent to cut them in half. Score points from the severed body segments.

  • Shield Ability: protects you against one attack from your opponent.

  • Butterfly Bomb: makes your opponents body segments fly off in all directions after a 10 second countdown. The bomb is visible to you but appears as a normal heart to your opponent. Caution: the bomb can be passed back to you if your opponent makes a successful attack in the countdown period.

  • Escape Ability: allows you to slide out of a tricky situation. Prevents loss of body segments when trapped.

  • Sacrifice Ability: sacrifice body segments (and score) to gain venom. This lets you use your other abilities when you need them.
title: Viperbyte

description:
L9Droid is an A-code interpreter offering free play of the complete collection of text adventures from Level 9 Computing:* the Middle Earth / Jewels of Darkness trilogy (Colossal Adventure, Adventure Quest, and Dungeon Adventure)

  • Silicon Dreams trilogy (Snowball, Return to Eden, and The Worm In Paradise)
  • Time & Magik trilogy (Red Moon, The Price of Magik, and Lords of Time)
  • both games in the Gnome Ranger series (Gnome Ranger, and Ingrid's Back: Gnome Ranger 2)
  • both games in the Adrian Mole series (The Secret Diary of Adrian Mole Aged 13¾, and The Growing Pains of Adrian Mole)
  • Emerald Island
  • the Saga of Erik the Viking
  • the Archers
  • Knight Orc
  • Lancelot
  • and Scapeghost

The app does not install with the games on-board, but integrates seamless downloads of them on-demand as needed.
title: L9Droid

description:
Run is a remake of the browser game of the same name, from which it loses the edit mode and keeps the gameplay unaltered, with entirely new levels.

The action is displayed in third-person view, from behind the playing character. Levels advance automatically at invariable speed. The aim is to reach the goal of each level (in exploration mode) or (in infinite mode) play as long as possible, without falling off from the level surfaces, which are interrupted by gaps (regular and rectangular).

Like in the original game, there is neither a timer or time limit, nor lives: each failure leads to restart from the same level, just a little behind the last reached point.

Three control methods are offered: tilt-based, touch-screen, on-screen.
title: Run

description: Mabeoppeojeul Aillaendeu: for Kakao, also informally known as Magic Puzzle Island, is a path-based match-3 game wherein two magical apprentices named Harry and Muse embark on a magical adventure. The goal in each level is to save the spritelings which are trapped inside cages. Players must match tokens in order to form a path. Spells and power-ups can be unlocked to help clear tiles. There are also different obstacles and enemies to be encountered as players progress throughout the game.
title: Mabeoppeojeul Aillaendeu: for Kakao

description: In Chicken Boom the player starts with a rifle and shoots chickens raining down on a farm from the sky. As the chickens are shot down, trying not to run out of ammunition, bigger and better weapons become available as the chickens come down more rapidly. Power-ups fall from the sky as well, such as bullets, full ammo icons, and chicken storm icons. Chicken storms cause the game to become rainy and dark and the player gets to shoot lightning down at the chickens without spending any ammunition, making it an effective bonus round. Coins also appear and can be spent on the menu screen to purchase power-ups that can be used at any time.
title: Chicken Boom

description:
Running Circles is a reflex action game based on moving between circles. The player controls a character that runs endlessly, without the player's input, inside a circle. By tapping the screen it moves the outer rim and tapping again back inside. The goal of the game is to move between as many connecting circles as possible, collecting diamonds and avoiding enemies along the way.

Circles only have a small part where they connect so the player has to time carefully. If the connection is missed, the character crashes and the game is over. The same happens when colliding with a circle while on the outer rim or with an opponent (both stationary and moving). Levels in the single-player mode are randomly generated for each session with only one try. There are many difficult parts where tapping quickly is required to avoid collisions as the character keeps on running and can never be stopped. The game keeps track of the best score, also visually while playing.

The game has a multiplayer mode where another player can be challenged to get the best score in a level. This is either done in real-time or as a challenge against a ghost version played at a later time. Diamonds collected during games can be used to continue from the point the character died or to unlock additional characters. The game is free-to-play with advertisements and in-app purchases. In-app purchases are used to acquire additional diamonds, unlock all characters, remove advertisements and enable an easy mode for single-player games. There is a tutorial to practise as well as daily bonuses.

sample_screenshots.caption: Overview of the past multiplayer games
The game uses colours to show when you have a new high score.
I made it to the sixth circle.

title: Running Circles

description: Doodle Basketball is a game about launching a basketball into the basket. The basketball is placed on a court in different spots in succession. The player taps and holds while moving to change the ball's trajectory, marked by a red dotted line. By releasing it the ball is launched. At the start the player has nine lives and the goal is to score as much as possible until no more lives are left. More points are provided from shooting from a distance. If a swish basket is scored, without touching the board or the ring, an additional ball (life) is provided. If three swishes in succession are scored, a bigger basket is provided for the next three shots. The game's visuals are hand drawn with crayon. The game is free and does not contain advertisements or in-app purchases.
title: Doodle Basketball

description:
Doodle Basketball 2 is the sequel to Doodle Basketball. Just like the first title it is a game about launching a basketball into the basket. The basketball is placed on a court in different spots in succession. The player taps and holds while moving to change the ball's trajectory, marked by a red dotted line. By releasing it the ball is launched. At the start the player has nine lives and the goal is to score as much as possible until no more lives are left. More points are provided from shooting from a distance. More points are provided from shooting from a distance. If a swish basket is scored, without touching the board or the ring, an additional ball (life) is provided. If three swishes in succession are scored, a bigger basket is provided for the next three shots.

The game expands the score system from the first game with new types of throws. If a ball is bounced on the ground and then goes in the basket, ten additional points are provided. If the ball hits the side of the screen and then goes in, the points are tripled. If both the court and the wall are used, the points are quadrupled. Other novelties for this version are different themes for the courts and a collection of different types of basketballs that can be unlocked in exchange for points.

Multiplayer is entirely new for this version, either by passing on the device, using Bluetooth or online multiplayer. It is based on the Minus Five pickup game where players shoot the ball in turns. If the ball misses the basket the player gets a minus and the first letter of a five-letter word is opened up. If the first player scores, the second player needs to mimic the shot in a general way (using the floor, using the wall or both). There are four ball priorities (simple shot, floor ball, wall ball, and floor and wall ball). The player who fails to score the fixed number of balls (five) loses the game and drops out.

The game's visuals are hand drawn with crayon. The game is once again free and does not contain in-app purchases, but now there are advertisements.

sample_screenshots.caption: There are different types of scenery to choose from.
Only one letter left and one of the players is out.
A longer shot that will be much faster.

title: Doodle Basketball 2

description:
Wehrschach is an almost forgotten tactical chess like game that was released and promoted prior to the Second World War by the German Military to increase the interest in war. It includes a lot of new rules and brings chess to a new level of tactical planning.

Played on a 11x11 squares board with 18 pieces of 5 different types, each war party strives to fulfill one of the various goals to win the battle. Will you aim to destroy the enemy infantry or to conquer their main base? Adopt your play to the strategy of your enemy and crush him.

Environmental tiles restrict or boost your movement, pieces block your path and the devilish reach of artillery and planes ensure a constant threat. The game supports online games as well as offline matches against the AI.
title: Wehrschach

description:
Developer Google has a tradition of including easter eggs with the release of each Android operating system. For Lollipop (Android 5) they included a variant of the mobile game Flappy Bird. Instead of tapping repeatedly to keep a bird in the air as it passes through narrow openings between pipes, players now control the Android mascot as it is maneuvered between large lollipops. The game keeps tracks of the score for each passed lollipop and there is only one life. When colliding, the level has to be restarted. The level design, direction and colours, as well as the time of day, is randomized for each session.

The game is accessed by going to the about section in the settings of the phone or tablet, and tapping the Android version repeatedly.

sample_screenshots.caption: A new game, now at dusk.
A night level and I made it to '1'.
In this session you travel to the left.
After tapping the version number in the settings, a lollipop appears. Tap it repeatedly and the game will start.

title: Android Lollipop (included games)

description: Prison Break: Lockdown is an escape room game set inside a prison. The game consists of nine prison cells, unlocked gradually, where the goal is to escape. Each room usually takes about ten to twenty actions to complete. The environment is shown from a first-person perspective. Certain parts of the environment can be tapped to take a closer look. Items can be picked up and are stored in an inventory, to use them elsewhere or to combine them to create something new. Items can be tapped twice to get a closer look. There are also many puzzles based on combinations of letters and numbers where the code needs to be found somewhere else in the environment. There is a free version of the game with an in-app purchase to remove all advertisements as well as a commercial versions. Both versions offer the same content.

sample_screenshots.caption: In the second cell you have a cellmate.
There is an item there, but there is a nasty spider in the way.
There is an item outside, but you can't reach it.
Now you need to figure out a code with letters.

title: Prison Break: Lockdown

description:
Angry Cecil: Revenge of Lion is a game made to capitalize on the 1st July 2015 event where Cecil, a 13-year-old male Southwest African lion, was killed by the American recreational big-game hunter Walter Palmer in Matabeleland North, Zimbabwe, Africa. The game consists of eighteen missions where one of three lions (Cecil, Jericho or King) needs to survive for a certain amount of time, kill hunters or protect cubs.

The levels are set in small city environments that can be explored freely. The lion is moved using a virtual D-Pad in the bottom left corner and a virtual button in the bottom right corner can be tapped to attack. A mini-map in the top right corner shows the position of the hunters and cubs, as well as the direction the lion is facing. The lion has a limited amount of energy (health) and that is shown in the top left corner. By completing missions coins can be earned to unlock the lions Jericho and King. They are identical in abilities, but have a different speed. Coins are also provided for running into objects or knocking them over. Additionally coins are needed to unlock a new level if the previous one was not completed. The game is in many ways unpolished, apparent through clipping problems and certain animations that are lacking.

The game is free-to-play without in-app purchases, but advertisements are shown regularly.

sample_screenshots.caption: You can still progress to the next level by spending some coins.

title: Angry Cecil: A Lion's Revenge

description:
On'nanoko + Mahjong=☆ ~Super Real Mah-jong~ is a mobile game in the Super Real Mahjong series. The player plays mahjong against various attractive girls. All girls from the entire series are present. Two play modes are available: 2 player mahjong and 4 player mahjong. The game features a different art style than previous games.

The game gives the option to sign in with the player's Super Real Mahjong account. Doing so enables the player to purchase images on the mobile site and download them for viewing in-game.

sample_screenshots.caption: Later in the game, I'm still ahead of Kasumi.
This time I'll play with Kasumi Serizawa.
I've cleared a mission.Getting all three stars for a girl will unlock a picture of them in the Treat section of the Gallery.

title: On'nanoko + Mahjong=☆ ~Super Real Mah-jong~

description:
Humble Mobile Bundle 14 is a compilation of eight Android games from various developers. It was available between 7th and 21st September 2015.

The bundle contains the following games:* Amelia and Terror of the Night

  • One More Line (Humble Edition)
  • Toy Defense

If more than the average was paid, the bundle also included:* Autumn Dynasty

  • Double Dragon Trilogy
  • Jones on Fire
  • Muertitos
  • Oddworld: Stranger's Wrath

In the tradition of the previous Humble Bundles the games were sold using a pay-what-you-want model and the ability to freely split the amount between the developers of the games, the Electronic Frontier Foundation and Worldreader charities and the Humble Bundle organizers. All games were advertised as being DRM free with the APK files available as a direct download.

The Humble Edition of One More Line is a custom version of the game with an optional Humble Bundle theme. The original game is free-to-play with an in-app purchase to remove ads. This version has the ads removed right away. Oddworld: Stranger's Wrath offers six versions for different types of devices:* ATC

  • ETC1
  • ETC2
  • PVRTC
  • PVRTC2
  • S3TC

For Jones on Fire and Muertitos the soundtrack is included as both MP3 and FLAC files. Those two games were not part of the bundle initially, but were added on 15th September 2015.

sample_screenshots.caption: Playing a game with the Humble Bundle theme as a background.
Title screen with the Humble Bundle theme
You can disable the theme and then the game becomes the regular version of the game, but with no advertisements.

title: Humble Mobile Bundle 14

description: Anemone is the story of a girl who has lost her mother. In order to cope with her loss, the player has to drag her through the five stages of grief: denial, anger, bargaining, depression and acceptance. These are all represented by five side-scrolling levels full of puzzles. Each level contains various 'angels' or statues that remind Anemone of certain things about her mother's personality. Though reading the 'angels' is completely optional, completing them can reveal Anemone's real ending. The game is short, around 30 minutes to an hour long, depending on a player's puzzle-solving speed.
title: Anemone

description:
CavePacker is a Soko-Ban variant set inside caves and built on the codebase of CaveExpress. The goal of the levels is to keep your cave tidy. To do this, a character needs to be moved around to ensure the packages are put onto their targets. You can only push, pulling is not allowed. The difficulty of the levels gradually increases.

The game supports multiplayer and uses map sets of XSokoban, KSokoban and GRIGoRusha. Players can also design custom maps. The solutions for the levels are included, there is pathfinding for easy movement, deadlock detection, and zoom for very big maps.
title: CavePacker

description:
Super Real Mah-jong ~Go Hōbi-tsuki~ is a mobile game in the Super Real Mahjong series. The player plays strip mahjong against various attractive young women and girls, and is rewarded with images of them. Two play modes are available: 2 player mahjong and 4 player mahjong.

The game gives the option to sign in with the player's Super Real Mahjong account. Doing so enables the player to purchase images on the mobile site and download them for viewing in-game.

sample_screenshots.caption: And, since my knowledge of mahjong is very basic, she eventually wins the entire game.

title: Super Real Mah-jong ~Go Hōbi-tsuki~

description:
Litron is fast arcade-like game inspired by Snake, Tron and 99 Problems. It uses 80's bright neon visuals with ghosting and music from that decade. The screen has the shape of a curved arcade display. The game was launched with 60 short, maze-like levels. The player controls a beam of light through four on-screen arrows. It moves at a constant speed and leaves behind a permanent trail that cannot be touched. It is also not allowed to hit walls or other objects. The trail of light needs to be guided to a white surface to complete the level.

Some mazes only have a single path and only require quick reflexes, while others require some planning. This cannot take too long as the trail will soon narrow the options. The game is free-to-play with in-app purchases to buy power-ups (slow motion, allow more hits or view a map with the solution), block advertisements, skip a level or skip an entire page of levels, or unlock everything at once.

sample_screenshots.caption: Here parts of the environment move along with you.
The line is very close to the light.
The purple line is moving, making it hard to get inside.

title: Litron

description:
Color Flood is a puzzle game based on the Filler concept. The game takes place on a board made up of square cells of various colors, and the player's goal is to expand his territory to fill the board with one color, starting with a single cell in the top-left corner. In each move, the player chooses a color, and all cells of the specified color that border the player's territory are annexed.

The game offers four play modes: Casual (with no move limit), Step Challenge (the player must fill the board within a specified minimum number of moves), and two Flood Race modes where the player competes with the computer, or another human player, to get a larger region of the board under his control. Three board sizes (12x12, 18x18, 24x24) and six different color palettes are available.

sample_screenshots.caption: A different board size and palette
Competing with the computer for control over the board

title: Color Flood

description: In Ninja Colors the player has to tap the corresponding color in order to remove blocks that stand in the ninja's way. The ninja runs at a steady pace and if he hits a block it's game over. The main goal is to remove as many blocks as possible and reach a higher score.

sample_screenshots.caption: To remove a pair you need to press two colors.

title: Ninja Colors

description:
Super Real Mah-jong is a mobile game from the Super Real Mahjong series. In it, you can play strip mahjong with all 18 girls from the series. In addition to new reward images, the game also features strip animations from previous games in the series that can be watched in a video player.

The game was delisted from the Google Play Store and the servers were taken offline in early 2016 when ownership of the Super Real Mahjong franchise shifted to Mighty Craft. They relaunched the game on September 22, 2016 as Super Real Mah-jong R.
title: Super Real Mah-jong

description:
Play Kittens is an idle game about cats, blending traditional whack-a-mole with simple collection and upgrade mechanics. Cats keep coming out of a box with nine holes. The player can make them meow and accumulates "meow bar" by touching their heads. It can also be collected automatically when idle. The player obtains "Happy cats" after filling the "meow bar", which increases the player's power, providing skills or getting new kittens. Kittens produce "Happy cats" automatically and learn new motions and talents when they level up.

Challenges come with a time limit after completing several stages. Kittens which help the player may fall asleep if too many cats escape from the box. Further stages allow the player to obtain "happy cats" more efficiently by good decisions of triggering active skills and kitten talents.

"Clean" is a special function to receive coins by restarting from the first stage when the player does not have enough power to proceed. Coins are used to acquire or upgrade toys, which help the player to achieve new stage records by different combinations of extra abilities.

There are two versions of the game: a free one with advertisements and a commercial version without ads.
title: Play Kittens

description: Join The Brick AA is a collection of jigsaw puzzles made up out of coloured bricks. Each puzzle is a rectangular shape where bricks with different shapes need to be moved around until everything fits and the rectangle is entirely filled. Puzzles are divided over three difficulty levels and unlocked gradually. Hints can be activated to show where a brick should be positioned. The game is free, but relies heavily on in-game advertisements. They are shown during every puzzle and also when moving to a next one.

sample_screenshots.caption: A puzzle playing the hard difficulty level.
The start of the first puzzle playing the easy difficulty.

title: Join The Brick AA

description:
Blocus is a Breakout variant with bright neon graphics. The gameplay builds on the classic formula of controlling a paddle near the bottom of the screen to bounce a ball and remove bricks from the field, but it adds some new elements. There are two types of paddles and they are divided into three parts. When the ball hits one of the paddle's three sections, it becomes warmer and when it is hot, bullets are shot automatically, destroying the bricks above. Particles have physics and will collide with the paddle or the walls. The player is rewarded for clearing columns and that increases the speed of the ball.

The game can be played in an endless mode or in a set of procedurally generated levels where the difficulty level is gradually increased. Destroyed bricks often leave behind power-ups such as additional balls or explosions. Diamonds can be collected as a currency to upgrade the paddle multiple times, improving the fire power. The game is free-to-play with an in-app purchase to remove the advertisements.

sample_screenshots.caption: Vertical columns cause lots of bounces
Bricks cause colourful explosions when they disappear.
With some luck you will make the entire screen explode.

title: Blocus

description:
This is a remastered version of the 1993 adventure game The 7th Guest for its 20th anniversary. Changes include the addition of hotspots, new icons and animations, a new map that can be accessed during gameplay, new game menus and a save/load system, four music options, improved voice-acting with optional subtitles, a HD graphic mode with upscaling to support high resolutions and 27 achievements.

Extras for this edition are:

  • Deleted audio parts (33 items)
  • Deleted scenes (19 items)
  • Making-of featurette
  • Soundtrack
  • The 7th Guest novel (157 pages)
  • The Original Script (104 pages)
title: The 7th Guest: Remastered

description:
Techno Kitten Adventure is a one-button game. The cat automatically moves forward, but also constantly falls downwards (this results in a diagonal movement). By tapping, the player can reverse this: now the cat moves upwards. The player needs to avoid the sparkling stars which form upwards/downwards boundaries as well as obstacles in the way. Each survived second the point counter fills up; the goal is to earn as many points as possible. This is not only required to gather a place on the high-score list, but also unlocks additional kittens for the level.

The level also has a large amount of animations in the fore- and background, e.g. pictures, ships, other flying animals or flashing colours. Those are designed to distract the player from the real dangers. The levels itself is randomly generated and features a techno song as music.

Of all released versions, this one has the least amount of content. There is only one level (the Dream Pack) available.
title: Techno Kitten Adventure

description: Party Ball Arcade, the sequel to Party Ball, is a game about rolling a ball through maze-like environments. The device's tilt sensors are used to roll the ball through more than 40 levels across three worlds. Along the way coke bottles are collected and the goal is to get to the end of the map. The player is required to collect at least eight bottles of cola to proceed, but there are often more to find. The player needs to dodge or defeat enemies and hazards like crabs, raccoons, spike traps and aliens using the Party Ball's charge attack.

sample_screenshots.caption: Well, at least I completed the maze.
I died. I can retry in a moment.
An enemy on the second maze

title: Party Ball Arcade

description:
Trailbreaker: Jupiter Edition is an action game inspired by Trailblazer where you guide a ball through lanes in space in a race against time. The ball accelerates by itself and can be moved left and right, and jump to follow a path and avoid falling into a void. Optionally brakes can be used to slow down the ball. Next to missing parts and platform jumping, tracks also have obstacles. The amount of recoveries per level is limited and time is also lost until the ball is back.

The game is free and does not contain in-app purchases. It is supported through ads, but not during gameplay. It contains about 250 levels grouped in eight level packs with different types. Some level packs include obstacles falling from the skies. Levels are procedurally generated and they last between 20 and 90 seconds to complete. The controls can be customized, using on-screen buttons or tilting the device.
title: Trailbreaker: Jupiter Edition

description:
Dragon Trader is a fantasy turn-based trading sim, inspired mostly by Dope Wars and Elite. As with many merchant games, it begins with the playing character owing a loan they cannot pay with the available money. The only way to pay the debt is by buying goods, moving to another location and selling goods at a profit. The loan grows every day, and if at the end of the game the player is unable to pay, they will have to face the loan shark, a huge dragon.

The game is played in turns, and moving from a town to another one takes one turn ("day"). The game length can be 20, 30 or 50 days. A menagerie of monsters will attempt to stop the player, but they can run from them, bribe them or even turn them into valuable resources if they invest in a "bounty hunter license". Random events (such as helpful wizards teleporting the player, goods sold at a higher or lower price) can also help or hinder the player.

As with Dope Wars, the game is luck dependent: the price of goods vary randomly from town to town and random events and encounters can heavily influence the early game. However, the player can also buy items in shops to minimize risk, such as weapons and armor to increase their chances in a fight or trading rumors to remove the randomness of goods' prices.

A Challenge mode provides variety, changing some of the game rules and usually hindering the player, for example by reducing the game's length without changing the amount of the loan or by having the monsters deal double damage.
title: Dragon Trader

description:
Taking over the role of team manager, the player should lead European football team to the top at EURO Championship 2016 in France. To achieve this, the player is allowed to take care of team players with proper actions, optimize the team's line up before the match, and choose the right pace during the match. Various statistics are provided for analysis. There are three game modes, representing hard and easy tournaments as well as a single match.

Free and Pro versions of the game are available, where the Pro version allows to edit the player names.

sample_screenshots.caption: Examining the location details of a certain match
A list of best goalkeepers of the tournament

title: Euro 2016 Manager

description:
Hellgate: London FPS is a free-to-play first-person shooter played exclusively from static positions without movement. It is based on different games in the Hellgate franchise, starting with Hellgate: London in 2007. It takes place in a futuristic, post-apocalyptic London where Earth is invaded through Hellgate portals. Fighting in different locations in London the player's character is a soldier who resists the invasion. There are different areas split up in multiple levels, often with short story sequences.

Each level consists of about five static scenes with some automatic movement to move to the next one. While moving no interaction is possible, including firing. From such a static position the player only needs to aim and shoot. For each level up to three stars can be earned by completing objectives. Sometimes a specific area needs to be defended or destroyed, enemies need to be killed and there are boss fights. Rewards include experience to level up, the basic currency money and dog tags. There is also an energy/stamina system that needs waiting time or a refill through currencies to keep playing levels. The premium currency of gems is used to buy single-use buff items before starting a mission.

Up to two guns can be carried and swapped on the fly. These include pistols, machineguns, sniper rifles and so on. They have to be reloaded when the clip is empty. Head shots are rewarded and there are often power-ups in the environment, such as exploding barrels, bombs or items that freeze enemies temporarily. Gradually and by spending money the player can buy armor and learn active and passive skills. These can also be upgraded several times. Active skills are additional abilities with a cooldown period. They include a shock wave, a devil's spear, a cold wave or summoning creatures. Passive skills mostly affect statistics such as stamina, health, precision, accuracy, regeneration or a time rift. Several types of weapons are found by completing missions and these can be upgraded several times. Next to the main missions there are challenge missions known as Challenge Hellrift.

sample_screenshots.caption: In-app purchases for gems, the premium currency

title: Hellgate: London FPS

description: Home Run Bash is a homerun derby game where the player has ten outs to hit as many home runs as possible. The game consists of selecting a field to play on and then trying to time your swing with the pitcher's release. To charge their swing, the player taps and holds the touch screen, and then releases it to swing at the pitch. The batted ball can also pop balloons floating over the playing field for bonus points. There are also achievements for doing things like hitting the pitcher or smashing scoreboards with the ball.
title: Homerun Bash

description:
This simple numbers game requires the player to scratch out all the numbers on the screen. The only way to scratch out numbers is with a pair of digits, or if the sum of the two digits is 10. Though, those digits need to be next to each other either vertically or horizontally. Once a number is scratched out, those spots are considered empty, and the player can then skip over those spots to scratch out more numbers. Once there are no more available moves due to no pairs being able to be scratched out, the player can "Check". Once the player Checks, the game adds all the numbers currently not scratched out to the end of the grid. There are two ways to complete a mode, the player can either scratch out every number, or have a game that result in no possible moves.

There are a few game modes, each mode has a help function that gives a hint on the player's next possible move:

  • 1-18:
    The basic game, the numbers from 1 through 18 are used and arranged into a grid. Only the numbers 1 through 9 are used, so the number ten is present as only a 1. Once a row is completely scratched out, the player has the option to clear that row and tidy up the playing grid. The starting playing grid is as follows:

1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9
1 1 1 2 1 3 1 4 1
5 1 6 1 7 1 8

  • 1-19:
    Runs the same as the 1-18 mode, except that 19 is added. The starting playing grid is as follows:

1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9
1 1 1 2 1 3 1 4 1
5 1 6 1 7 1 8 1 9

  • Quick mode:
    This mode has the option of a starting grid of either 1-18 or random numbers. The random numbers grid will be the same size as a 1-18 grid. This mode is designed to create a quicker game by allowing two things: 1) the help option refresh timer is sped up considerably, 2) it automatically advises once there isn't any further moves and to Check.

  • Column mode:
    This mode doesn't allow the clearing of rows, but of columns. This makes for a trickier game than previous modes, as you can easily run into a game that has no moves. There is an option of a 1-18 grid, or random number grid.

  • Time duel:
    This mode is a test on how quick the player is to solve a grid. The starting grid for this mode is random digits.

sample_screenshots.caption: Showcasing the option of changing the in game colors

title: Numbers Game: Numberama

description: Shikaku Ultimate is a puzzle game in which the player is required to fill up the game board with colors based on the predetermined hints. The hints can range to the amount of cells the specific color takes up to a specific shape the color is required to look like. There are 200 levels to complete, and the game allows 10 free hints across those levels (with additional hints available to be purchased).
title: Shikaku Ultimate

description: Stickman Dismounting is a physics-based game. Player launches a stickman from various terrain via an assortment of transports. You can also complete missions and receive coins. With coins, you can unlock new levels, transports, skins and level elements.
title: Stickman Dismounting

description:
Real Football is the follow-up to Real Football 2016, dropping the year from its name. Players can play matches with teams to practice or participate in leagues and cups. The game can also be approached as a business simulation, managing teams and players while match results are calculated automatically.

Teams can have different formations and the strength is determined through three numbers representing offensive, midfield and defensive strength, based on the score of the individual players also shown through a number. A custom team can be created, with a logo, a team name and different options for home and away kits. The game is free-to-play and uses different currencies to recruit new players through card packs at the lottery, similar to many contemporary EA Sports games and the Ultimate Team modes in those titles. Pack types include realistic (level 1-5), advanced (4-7), talent (5-7) and midfielder (4-7). Each player is defined through six statistics. Management options include team formation and tactics, training to improve player attributes, facilities to restore or improve the players' conditions such as stadiums, hospitals, physiotherapy centres and youth camps, and transfers through auctions.

By winning matches the basic coins currency is won, along with experience for the global player level and items such as training points or medical kits. Gold is the premium currency. Training points can be spent to improve specific player abilities, such as shooting, headers, long shots or set pieces. Next to a league system there are friendly games, online tournaments (world arena and social tournament) and continent cups. Matches consume energy points and these take a while to recharge or can be replenished by spending the premium currency.

The game is controlled through a virtual D-pad for movement on the left side of the screen and virtual buttons on the right side for actions. While attacking there are actions for shooting, passing, sprinting and through shots, and while defending there is pressing, sprinting, tackling and switching players. Many different actions are available as buttons can be manipulated in different ways, such as tapping, holding or sliding up. Additional actions then include short passes, one-twos, through passes, sliding tackles, long passes, feinting, roulette, lob passes and shots, or causing the goalkeeper to rush out.

The game has social elements to exchange codes and add friends. Coins and items can be swapped as gifts. There is a replay function to review goals. The game does not have licensed player names or teams.

sample_screenshots.caption: Checking up on the player development of my team.
The lottery where you can buy packs for new players.
I spent a lot of gold to get this promising Portuguese player.

title: Real Football

description: Tangram is an adaptation of the traditional Chinese puzzle. The player is given a number of pieces, which must be combined into a specified shape by moving, rotating and flipping them. The game contains a "challenge" mode where the player completes levels in a specified order, an "arcade" mode where the player can request a puzzle of the specified difficulty, and a "time attack" mode where the player tries to complete as many puzzles as possible within a time limit, getting a time bonus for every solved puzzle.

sample_screenshots.caption: Completed the arcade mode puzzle, now choose the difficulty of the next one

title: Tangram

description:
Outlaw Poker is a dueling game with an Old West setting played using the Poker card game mechanics. At the start of the game each player, either an online player or controlled by the computer, is dealt five cards that are hidden for the opponent. Each player chooses one card out of the five to keep and the open spot is fulled up with a new card. The cards are then locked until both players have completed this. Then the hands of five cards are swapped between the players and the process is repeated until five cards have been chosen. While the selected cards always remain hidden, it is still possible to guess what the other player is holding or choosing through the swaps. After choosing five cards two pistol duelers are shown in the middle of a town and as they draw the cards are revealed and the best poker hand wins, shooting the other character.

The game is free-to-play and does not contain in-app purchases. By winning duels gold is earned and this can be used to bet before starting a new game. Gradually higher betting levels are unlocked. Additional gold can be earned by watching video advertisements.

sample_screenshots.caption: The clock is ticking, you only have a small amount of time to choose.

title: Outlaw Poker

description:
Entropy is a challenging puzzle about balancing the universe on Mobile.

Rotate the triangles in order for all of them to have a different element on all their edges. Entropy offers a relaxing puzzle experience with over 60 handmade levels. Many new mechanics are introduced through the levels to keep the experience fresh.
title: Entropy: A Quest for Harmony

description: Orbital Loop is a celestial music creation experience in VR. With simple controls, any user with little to no music experience can arrange the planets and moons of a solar system to create beautiful and impressive songs.
title: Orbital Loop

alternate_titles.title: Reign of Amira: The Lost Kingdom

description:
Play as Princess Amira the assassin/warrior trying to reclaim her throne of the Desert Kingdom Androa in this sequel to the studios earlier game Desert Winds, featuring the same protagonist.

This is a free Android mobile hack and slash game from Qualcomm's internal game studio, intended as a demonstrator and showcase exclusively for a Qualcomm Snapdragon-based device 'S4 Pro' with an integrated 'Adreno 320' graphics processor, or higher.
title: Reign of Amira

description:
Xtreme Racing 2 - Speed Car RC is an arcade racing game where you take control of RC cars instead of real cars. This allows the game to take a less realistic approach to racing: do stunts, dodge obstacles, hit the opponents and activate turbos to win the race.

As you win races you can upgrade your driving skills as well as your car specs. You can also customize your car with special parts and paintings.
title: Xtreme Racing 2

description:
Developer Google has a tradition of including Easter Eggs with the release of each Android operating system. For Marshmallow (Android 6.x) they included a variant of the mobile game Flappy Bird.

Instead of tapping repeatedly to keep a bird in the air as it passes through narrow openings between pipes, players now control the Android mascot as it is maneuvered between large marshmallows on sticks. The game keeps tracks of the score for each passed marshmallow and there is only one life. When colliding, the level has to be restarted. The level design, direction and colours, as well as the time of day, is randomized for each session.

The game is accessed by going to the about section in the settings of the phone or tablet, and tapping the Android version repeatedly.

The game is still included in Android, hidden away in the activities. You need an "activity launcher" to access the game In later versions.

sample_screenshots.caption: The floor isn't going to be any better.

title: Android Marshmallow (included games)

description:
Developer Google has a tradition of including easter eggs with the release of each Android operating system. For the Nougat (Android 7.x), they release Android Neko. It follows in a similar style to Neko Atsume, in which the player leaves out food to attract cats. If a cat shows up, the cat is added to the player's collection. Collected cats can be re-named (they are designated as numbers until the player does so).

The game is accessed by going to the about section in the settings of the phone or tablet, and tapping the Android version repeatedly.

A similar version was re-released for Android Red Velvet Cake (11).

sample_screenshots.caption: You can name the cats anything you want
Choose a food to leave on the plate to draw cats in
More kitties, including a rare purple one!
An empty dish waiting for a snack

title: Android Nougat (included games)

description: Magic Bubble 3 is a Puyo Puyo clone. It features a story mode full of fairy tale characters like the Big Bad Wolf and Little Red Hood and other fantastical creatures like a witch, a duck, a pig and a maiden, as well as a casual 1-on-1 battle mode. The main difference with the regular Puyo Puyo games is that it comes with special puyos like a magical orb that changes the colour of nearby puyos, a bomb and a timed puyo that transforms into a regular puyo after five turns.
title: Magic Bubble 3

description: Term1nal is a Cyberpunk stealth game for Gear VR in which the user plays a hacker called Flynn Lightman who takes control of an android when paid to infiltrate a corporation called Stride Industries. Flynn can move the android around Stride's offices and interact with terminals to unlock doors, enable elevators, etc. Security androids need to be avoided and a friendly robot dog can be given commands to distract, stun or disable them. To hack terminals the player must engage in first person hacking mini-games. The game features twelve story-based missions and is controlled with the Gear VR Controller.
title: Term1nal

description:
Project Apellium is an interactive fiction, centered around a young and creative genius who was gifted by a superior force and his journey to what he calls “the most amazing world ever created”.

His science and fantasy covered adventure is filled with mystery, action, violence, romance and drama. During the journey, our protagonist faces daily life issues and dark threats.
title: Project Apellium

description: Neurotron is an action RPG where you control a group of heroes in a dark cyberpunk world. In the style of Lost Vikings you can only control one hero at a time. The characters have varying skills and abilities, and each one of them can be upgraded in-between missions. The game takes heavy inspiration from adventure board games such as HeroQuest, Space Crusade and Descent: Journeys in the Dark by Fantasy Flight Games.

sample_screenshots.caption: Cyborg discovering a room with random loot.
There are some small side quests during the missions, which you can complete.
Promotional screenshot.  Cyborg fighting against the Kronirs, mutant soldiers of the company.
Promotional screenshot. Medical factory and Elite Soldiers firing at the hero.

title: Neurotron

description: Pepe Scream is an arcade game similar to Flappy Bird. The player controls the internet meme character "Pepe the Frog", who is flying in an airplane and must dodge obstacles. In order to give Pepe an upwards boost, the player must yell into the microphone. On the way, Pepe can collect "tendies" (chicken tenders) which can be used to unlock additional skins, called "Rare Pepes".

sample_screenshots.caption: You can get a new skin here.

title: Pepe Scream

description: Tilted is a game where you play as a prism navigating its way through crystalline caverns and solving puzzles by using the laws of reflection and refraction. The prism is on a quest for photons and ultimately Illuminating the universe, overrun by darkness and other hazards.

sample_screenshots.caption: Prisso reflecting the laser from a mirror.
Trying to get a hidden photon.
Breaking glass for the first time.
Prisso breaking the glass and moving at fast speed.

title: Tilted

description: World Traveler VR is a geo guessing, hidden object VR game in which your goal is to figure out which city you are in. On each level of the game you are "teleported" to an unknown street or location somewhere on Earth and you need to uncover the mystery: where am I?
title: World Traveler VR

description:
Towerland VR is a tower defense game where the player's character can also dive into the action to participate directly with first-person shooter gameplay. The core gameplay is based around building defensive structures, but direct intervention is also possible.

Games consists of build and attack phases. In the build phase a maze can be constructed to hinder enemies. At the same time a wall element serves as a tower platform. When there is no tower, a platform can be used by the player's character as a bunker. Towers include an ice tower to slow down enemies, a cannon tower to shoot cannon balls, an aerial cannon to target flying enemies and a fire trap to ignite crossing enemies. During the attack phase a red crystal needs to be protected. Enemies come from all directions and parachute in. Different weapons can be used during the first-person shooter gameplay.
title: Towerland VR

description:
Gem Miner tasks the player with digging a mine to search for a variety of ores and artifacts, which can then be sold to buy new tools, upgrades to existing tools, and improved mining abilities. The game uses a side view platforming-style camera to display large, randomly generated levels that include hazards such as falling rocks, underground lakes, and lava. Character movement is governed by a virtual joystick, while a single virtual button controls the miner's pickaxe. A map in viewable at any time, and is gradually revealed as the player progresses through the mine. Character movement is limited by a stamina meter; once depleted, the miner is unable to move, leaving him to be automatically rescued and forfeiting any ore he's collected. Stamina is replenished by returning to the miner's camp on the surface. Also limiting individual trips below the surface is the miner's inventory size, as any ore collected once the miner's pack is full is lost.

Additionally, challenges are available that present the player with a specific scenario to overcome. Completing these challenges rewards the player with medals.

sample_screenshots.caption: Back to the surface, selling the

title: Gem Miner: Dig Deeper

alternate_titles.title: Grandma run away from Zombies Whack Edition
Vovó fuja dos Zumbis Whack Edition

description:
When getting a shortcut through the cemetery, granny Amelia got herself trapped by zombies that won't stop spawning from their graves.

Granny Whack-A-Zombie, as the name implies, is a whack-a-mole game with a zombie theme. Players have to tap on the screen to hit the zombies before they come back to their graves. The graves are distributed in a 3 x 3 grid. Granny Amelia will pop out of the graves also, so players have to avoid tapping on her. Letting the zombies return to their graves oh hitting granny Amelia reduces the players' sanity level, measured by 5 brains.

There are 4 types of zombies. Regular ones will just appear and return to their graves. Mutants will come out as humans and must be hit only if and after they transform into zombies; some won't transform and should return to the graves with no penalty. Punk zombies carry spray cans and will use it on the players' screen, blocking the view temporarily. Throwers will throw skulls against the screen.

Sometimes money will appear on the graves, hitting it awards points. Brains will also appear and can be collected to recover sanity. The game progresses goes on until the sanity meter is completely depleted.

sample_screenshots.caption: I've got sprayed and hit by a skull!
You have to wait and see if the mutants transform, if you hit them in human form you lose sanity.
The punk zombie will spray the screen, you must hit him before he does it.
The Thrower will throw skulls at you.

title: Granny Whack-A-Zombie

description:
A substantial upgrade over Gem Miner: Dig Deeper, Gem Miner 2 brings improved graphics, additional challenges and missions, and new tools, treasures, and hazards. The game sticks to the side view platforming-style camera of its predecessor, allowing the player to navigate a large, randomly generated mine in search of valuable ore, gemstones, and artifacts. New scenarios called expeditions provide a more guided play style, giving the player specific goals to meet to clear each level. 2 optional mission packs are available as in-app purchases.

The app supports Bluetooth gamepads, Google TV, and LIFX wireless light bulbs for real-life atmospheric lighting.
title: Gem Miner 2

description: Stone Wars Arcade is a port of the iOS game Stone Wars. It only includes the iOS game's arcade mode, with the multiplayer versus modes completely removed as well as the puzzle training mode which was released on Android as a separate game called Stone Wars Puzzle.
title: Stone Wars Arcade

description: Stone Wars Puzzle is a port of the iOS game Stone Wars. It only includes the iOS game's Puzzle mode, with the multiplayer versus modes completely removed as well as the Arcade mode which was released on Android as a separate game called Stone Wars Arcade.
title: Stone Wars Puzzle

description: Badge(r)s is a location based game where the main goal is to collect as many different virtual items as possible. To do this, you need to move around in the real world. While leveling up you also produce your own items which you can share with the world. The world is divided into quadrants which belong to regions. Players with the most items in an region become rulers of that region. Players who play the most quadrants, become mappers.
title: Badge(r)s

description: Guide your GEMazing ball through the labyrinth of sparkly gems. Don't fall down the holes! And watch out for the edge of the maze! Make it through all 15 levels and tell your friends how GEMazing you are!
title: GEMazeBalls

description: Addled is a puzzle game in which the objective is to select multiple numbers from a grid so that they equal a specific value. The level packs are sets of 500 Addled levels to play through. There are 10 level packs with 500 levels in each of them, and so there are 5000 levels in total.
title: Addled

description:
Gridwords is a word based puzzle game in which the player has to find words of a specific length with a grid of letters (Such as 3 letters per level). In the beginning of every level, the player is given 100 points. If the unselects a group of squares, 1 point is taken away for each unselected letter, but if no letters are unselected in a level, the score will be 100. If the player is stuck, he/she can tap the light bulb icon on the top-left corner of the screen to bring up the hint dialog. However, the hints must be paid with virtual coins. The coins are earned when a level is finished, and the player gets 5 of them is they perfectly finish a level, otherwise, though, he/she would get 1 coin for each level.

The game has 3 difficulty levels and 10 level packs with 250 levels provided, which add up to a total of 7500 levels.
title: Gridwords

description: YOTZ is a 2-player version of the well-known dice game of Yahtzee. The goal of this game is to score points by creating various combinations on every roll of the 5 dice. After the 1st roll, the number of dice can be rolled again (up to 6 simultaneous games per turn) to achieve a desirable set. The upper sets (1 through 6) are scored by summing up the dice with the respective numbers, and the lower sets contain various combinations: three/four of a kind, full house, small/large straights, chance (sum of all dice) and YOTZ (five of a kind).
title: YOTZ

description:
Extreme Burger Defense is a tower defense game where the player must protect a burger from waves of hungry bears. The player can set up three types of towers: a tower which shoots bullets at nearby bears, a crystal launcher which launches crystals that explode in a wide radius, and a tower which activates a damaging field every so often that also slows down any bear caught in it. The towers can be only built on grass, on tiles unoccupied by trees.

Destroying the dastardly ursines causes them to drop silver and (occasionally) gold coins, which must be quickly collected before they fade. Silver coins can be spent on new towers, on chopping down trees, or upgrading the capabilities of constructed towers. The player's cache of gold coins is retained between games and can be spent in the main menu to improve specific types of towers.

If a bear makes his way to the burger, it will pick up the snack and try to escape with it, and must be killed before it can carry the burger off the screen. When the burger gets successfully stolen, the game ends. There is no ending, and the player's goal is simply to attain the longest time possible.
title: Extreme Burger Defense

description:
The Android version of Real Football 2018 is the follow-up to Real Football (2017) and uses the same game engine. Unlike its predecessor it is was released as a premium title and not free-to-play. Like in the 2017 edition the main game mode is the Seasons mode which works largely the same albeit without in app purchases. One difference is that the auto-play option has been replaced with a highlights mode where the match is described as a text commentary. Another new feature is the agency system where agents can be hired to sign players.

A new game mode in this edition is the 5v5 mode which is made up of mini-game challenges played against other players online. In each game the player either attacks or defends. The player that challenges another player attacks and has to score as many goals as possible while the player who is challenged has to defend and concede as few goals as possible. Each game starts with a kick-off scenario and is followed by ten random scenarios. In each scenario the player has twenty seconds to score. By winning matches the player earns points and advances on the online leaderboard. Challenging a higher ranked team leads to larger rewards.

The other game modes included are friendlies and two different cups: European Tournament (which is based on Euro 2016) and American Cup (which is based on the 2015 Copa América).
title: Real Football 2018

description:
Spinsling is an endless runner game where the player controls two creatures connected with an elastic bond, allowing for one character to throw the other in a slingshot manner, to avoid various obstacles on screen.

The introductory story shows a pirate in a flying ship hunting for the two player characters, who are trying to escape him, also flying through the air. After initially being captured, the game starts with the two escaping, while being continually followed by the pirate ship. The distance between the ship and the escapees are shown on a menu bar on the bottom of the screen, indicating how much time you have to pick up bonuses on screen before you have to proceed.

A player fixes one of the creatures on a spot on the screen (in the air), and then slings the other forward (right) on a rope-like bond to fixate on a new point on the screen, hopefully not swinging through any obstacles.

The scrolling play area is filled with dangerous bombs & spikes, but also has power-up items to pickup.

A player can choose from several (20+) creatures to use, and change their looks with different costume items.
title: Spinsling

description: Pie Noon is a simple multiplayer party game where you can throw pies at your friends. The game shows how to use several open source technology components developed by Google.
title: Pie Noon

description: Droppem is a digital take on the classic kids game KerPlunk. Player can compete against up to 4 other A.I. or Human players in a race to drop the most marbles. Each player is given a turn where they are allowed to pull on stick from the tube in hopes of dropping marbles and gaining points.
title: Droppem

description:
Starborn Wanderers is a space exploration RPG inspired by Space Rangers series. It is also blends space exploration with trading and role-playing. But more orientated on story driven progress that on exploration or trading. While players progress through story they unlock new ships, skill upgrades and more. In additional to story quests game includes multiply additional activates like bounty hunting, mining and so on.

Game also include arena style player vs player battles, with leaderboard and leagues.
title: Starborn Wanderers

description: el Bake is a simple game in which the player helps Bakir Izetbegović, the Bosniak member of the tripartite Presidency of Bosnia and Herzegovina, collect money from several cities in his country while avoiding police cars, protestors, and road holes.
title: El Bake

description:
They Come Down is a classic shoot 'em up that mimics the retro aesthetics with old VHS feel. The main feature is that all the player's bullets become affected by gravity, falling again to player's position at the bottom of the screen.

The player can gather limited-time power-ups, and points, which act as lives too, have a direct effect on the difficulty level: the more lives the player has, the more bullets he will shoot.
title: They Come Down

description:
Desert Legacy is a top-to-bottom endless runner set in a long time forgotten desert. The player controls a ship and needs to drift through the sand avoiding the ruins. Between these obstacle formations there are coins that the player can collect to improve the final score. These coins can be used to buy new skins.

The speed will increase as long as player stays alive, and more complex sets of obstacles will appear.
title: Desert Legacy

description:
Panda Stick! is an endless runner in which a panda bear must jump from platform to platform using a bamboo cane. The panda will climb the bamboo and the player must decide when is the moment to break the cane in order to make the panda fall on the next platform.

The player also will need to be precise: to fall above the rice bowl means to collect a coin that can be used later in the shop.
title: Panda Stick!

description: Lode Runner X is a conversion of the 2009 Xbox Live Arcade game Lode Runner exclusively made for Sony Ericsson's line of Xperia smartphones (specifically the Xperia Play). It is a cut down version of the original game and contains only the single player Journey and Puzzles mode. The Journey mode contains 80 levels and 16 bonus rooms while the Puzzles mode contains 50 levels. The game can be controlled with either the Xperia Play's slide-out control deck or touch screen controls.
title: Lode Runner X

description: In this game you control ball lightning, avoid obstacles and try to win record points and statuses. You'll need to manage the main character - the ball lightning - with the phone's accelerometer.
title: Brighto Light

description: Fire Escape is an interactive, episodic Virtual Reality project that puts players in Crown Heights, Brooklyn - where they watch a group of residents living across the street as they reckon with the changing neighborhood and gentrification of their building. Over the course of the night, things take a darker turn when a murder takes place, and the player's role grows for a voyeur to a participant, texting different characters as they become entangled in events. As the player watches multiple scenes unfold in real-time, you must choose what to watch knowing you are always missing clues, context, and narrative along the way. With a diverse, eclectic cast of stories, Fire Escape draws from anxiety-induced storytelling of Hitchcock to create a vivid, interactive storyworld for the form of VR.
title: Fire Escape: An Interactive VR Series

description:
Blade Runner: Revelations is a VR game for Daydream devices. Set between the events of Blade Runner and Blade Runner: 2049, the game casts players as Detective Harper, a Blade Runner with the LAPD. Harper is tasked with stopping the Replicant Underground, a group of Replicant terrorists using violent methods to fight for Replicant rights. As he investigates, he begins to unravel a mystery that places him at the center of the conflict between Replicants and humans. Harper has to find the truth behind the conspiracies, and himself, and ultimately decide where his allegiance lies.

Blade Runner: Revelations is an adventure game that features a variety of virtual reality gameplay modes. Players navigate various areas of LA, both original and from the film. You'll investigate crime scenes, find clues, and interrogate witnesses. You can also use ESPER, a special feature that allows you to replay and rewatch crimes. Other levels will put you in the cockpit of a spinner, in the police station performing the Voight-Kampff test, or in the middle of a gunfight. Through it all, players can choose how to respond to the people they meet and make decisions that will change the story and the fate of human and Replicant kind.
title: Blade Runner: Revelations

description: In this choice-based storygame, players assume the role of a humble junk dealer living in the north of the merry old land of Oz, L. Frank Baum's fantasy land of Munchkins, flying monkeys, Emerald Cities and wicked witches. Speaking of which, there's a power vacuum in Oz since Dorothy Gale brought about the end of the regimes of the previous witchy rulers -- if choosy players manage to successfully pick the one true (yellow brick) path, they might well find themselves ruling their neck of the woods. But will they be wicked tyrants or beneficent monarchs? Humbug! Only their choices can answer that question!
title: NE By NW Oz

description: In this choice-based storygame, players are given the role of a country's head of state, presented with the task of secretly supervising the design and construction and preparing for the voyage of an interstellar ark spacecraft, transplanting a portion of their country's populace to a new faraway system in advance of a cataclysmic asteroid strike on planet Earth.
title: The Kepler Colony: Evacuation

description: This zany, madcap choice-based storygame is most certainly the best game ever made using its particular scenario, because its combination of story elements must surely be unique: the player steps into the shoes of a producer of an antique-appraisal television show, a beat typically only nominally livelier than watching paint dry, when an unscheduled guest arrives at the antique fair looking to cash in on a truly vintage set of long-preserved human remains. One inadvertently-invoked resurrection spell later, the homicidal mummy is tearing a strip through the flea market, while various unlikely factions -- witches, a Catholic priest, even the FBI -- compete to subdue the threat and claim its power for their own. Meanwhile, the player needs to make sure the camera keeps rolling and remains pointed in the direction of breaking action...
title: A Mummy Is Not an Antique

description: In this choice-based storygame, players are whisked off to a Regency romance, replaying the events of Jane Austen's novel Pride and Prejudice, but this time with a few more options (by which we mostly mean bachelors) available to a woman of marriageable age.
title: The Courting of Miss Bennet

description: Prime Time Rush is an endless 'driver' game where you escape from the police in a television-style car chase coverage. There's oil trucks with gas you can steal from and an endless traffic you must get through to win each race.
title: Prime Time Rush

description: Octopia is a tile-matching game with an octopus theme.
title: Octopia

description: KolobkYo is a simple platformer with a twist - you can't move backwards and can't see what's in front of you. Each level contain a number of money bags, and to get a perfect score you need to collect them all as well as avoid any hazards. Unlocking further levels requires getting a high enough score on previous levels. The lack of vision in front of you means you have to rely on luck or memorization to beat the levels and collect the treasure.
title: KolobkYo

description: In this urban fantasy storygame, the player makes choices on behalf of a teenager separated from their family during a turbulent period of street clashes in their home town of Windbrooke. Some supernatural power is raising tensions in our world and the task falls to our hero to get to the bottom of the problem by phasing through to a nightmarish parallel reality superimposed upon our own... and put the unrest to an end with the help of a sword, a bow, or magic of their own.
title: The Haze Under Windbrooke

description: Portal Ball is a puzzle game designed to be played in short breaks between watching TV programs and other activities. A ball bounces around the screen and you spawn up to two portals with your fingers by tapping in the playing area. The ball maintains direction and speed and travels through the portals in order to collect points. You can choose to either play it passively or actively depending on the upgrades you equip during the game. You can have up to five upgrades equipped at any one time, which influence anything from the ball to the portals, to asteroids, gems and crates, or the scoring system itself. Depending on the upgrades, most of the environment settings and the balls can be changed.
title: Portal Ball

description: Sudoku: The Clean One is a simple Sudoku game with five levels of difficulty. The game is played by selecting the square you wish to edit, then pressing the number underneath to add that number (the player can also select the number first then the square if they change the order in the settings). Selecting the pencil button on the bottom of the screen will allow the player to mark a square with multiple numbers. The player also has access to three different assists that can be turned on or off, the first assist highlights all numbers on the grid that are the same as the one currently selected, the second shows the remaining amount of each missing digit bellow the selectable numbers, and the final one automatically removes numbers marked using the pencil when they are no longer a possible result based on the already filled in squares.
title: Sudoku: The Clean One

description: VR Karts: GP is a slightly cut down version of VR Karts: Sprint designed specifically for Google Cardboard. The game features all the singleplayer content as its Gear VR counterpart (at the time of release), however lacks the online multiplayer mode.
title: VR Karts: GP

description: Catch Play is a free-to-play action sports game. It features wacky, over-the-top characters in a sports-themed combat arena.
title: Catch Play for Kakao

description:
Saban's Power Rangers: Super Megaforce is an Israeli-exclusive runner game. Unlike endless runners, this game features 24 stages which can be completed, as well as an attack button to slash the enemies on the way.

Players are given a choice of 5 rangers from the aforementioned series to run as.

By holding the jump button, players can glide in the air and holding the attack button can charge a ranger's attack, allowing them to dash and slash their way through. Players can also collect coins but these coins can't be spent and no high score system has been implemented for this game.

There are no dialogues in the game so it's unnecessary to know Hebrew to play it.

sample_screenshots.caption: You can choose any of the five rangers pictured above but it doesn't change the gameplay.
Gameplay. You can jump, you can attack, collect coins though there's no real incentive to do so since you can't spend them.
24 levels are available for you to play.

title: Saban's Power Rangers: Super Megaforce

description:
Real Football 2019 is the sixteenth annual entry in Gameloft's series of mobile football games. The game is similar to the previous year's release and like that is a premium version of the free-to-play title Real Football. Like in the 2018 edition the main game mode is the Seasons mode which is mostly the same but with some additions such as sponsorship deals which are given when certain goals are reached.

The other game modes are friendlies, international cups, historical challenges and online leagues. The international cup is a replica of the 2018 World Cup with all the 32 national teams playing in their respective groups. The historical challenge mode consists of 20 challenges based on real life matches from the history of the sport. There are three objectives for each match and a star is earned for each one. Objectives can include winning the match or to score and not concede a certain number of goals. The online league is a PvP tournament where the player has to win matches to climb the ranks of the leaderboard.
title: Real Football 2019

description:
Pinball is based on the popular American table game of pinball which involves using a pair of flippers to direct a small ball into bumpers, thus scoring points.

There are 7 table variants available:* Magma

  • Aztec
  • Soccer
  • Invaders
