  • Android Land
  • Sixties
  • Christmas Tree
title: Pinball

description:
Geometry Craft: Episode I is a clone of Geometry Dash, using textures from Minecraft. The player controls a square-shaped protagonist whose only ability is jumping. If it bumps into something, it dies.

The game features 3 levels:

  • The Overworld
  • Cave
  • The Nether
title: Geometry Craft: Episode I

description: Reblob is a puzzle game for Android. Every level is grid based and a single screen, so all grids are visible at once. The player moves the character squishy from its spawn point orthogonally to reach a destination. Obstacles are blocking walls, deadly lava tiles, deadly cyclopes and blocked destination points – supporting mechanics are switches to remove some walls, portals to teleport to a specific location and a special switch to open the access to the exit if it is blocked. When squishy dies in the lava he leaves a bridge that can be used once to cross over the lava. So dying becomes a tactical component in solving a level, but only a finite number of blobs is available in each level. If the last blob is consumed the level needs to be restarted. Additionally – and this is the unique core mechanic of the game – you can move the spawn point to a free location up to three grids away from your position, even diagonally. So to traverse the possibility space of the levels you need to think back and forth in space and time and sometimes die to the left to respawn to the right of an obstacle to use the bridges to safely reach the exit. The game offers 65 Levels: 15 for the tutorial, 10 advanced puzzles, 10 portals, 10 cyclops, 10 switches and 10 combinations to prove mastery of all mechanics.

sample_screenshots.caption: Squishy gets eaten by a cyclops

title: Reblob

description:
PANOSSONIC is a 2D runner in which players control a brown Sonic the Hedgehog. The aim of the game is to help Sonic get to the toilet. Along the way, the protagonist will encounter various obstacles that need to be jumped over, otherwise he would lose. There's toilet paper on the way, if players collect 10 toilet paper rolls, they will activate bonus acceleration.

There are 2 levels:

• Brown Hills Zone

• Coming Storm Zone
title: PANOSSONIC

description: Flappy Uganda Knuckles is a clone of Flappy Bird, but instead of a bird, you play as Uganda Knuckles. Pipes are colored to red. If you fall you lose.
title: Flappy Uganda Knuckles

description: Flappy Ball is a clone of Flappy Bird, but instead of a bird, you play as an orange ball. If you touch the pipe or fall you lose.
title: Flappy Ball

description: In Slendrina the player must find six items and then get to the exit without getting caught by Slendrina to win. If Slendrina shows up the player must quickly look the other way and move away to avoid getting killed. The game features four levels: The warehouse, the hotel, the yard and the swamp.
title: Slendrina

description: In Slendrina: Asylum the player is trapped in an old abandon asylum and must find 8 pages of a medical book to escape. While exploring the asylum the player must watch out for Slendrina and her mother, both will kill the player if encountered. While it is enough to look away from Slendrina to escape from her the player must hide from her mother.

sample_screenshots.caption: This is where the game starts

title: Slendrina: Asylum

description: In Slendrina: The Cellar the player is trapped in a cellar and needs to find 8 books to escape. While looking for the books the player must be careful not to run into Slendrina. Some doors that the player encounters will be locked and require keys to be unlocked. Keys and books are randomly placed on the map at the start of each game.

sample_screenshots.caption: Blood is coming from that door

title: Slendrina: The Cellar

description: In Slendrina: The Cellar 2 the player is trapped in a cellar and needs to find eight books to unlock the exit. While exploring the cellar the player must watch out for Slendrina, her mom and her baby. While it is enough to look away from Slendrina to escape from her the player must run and hide from her mother and her baby. Some doors in the cellar are locked and must be unlocked by using keys. Keys and books are placed randomly in the cellar each game.

sample_screenshots.caption: Oh no Slendrinas mother found me
A room with an empty shelf

title: Slendrina: The Cellar 2

description: In Slendrina X the player is trapped in a castle belonging to Slendrina and her husband. To escape the castle the player needs to find the key to the castles entrance. While exploring the castle the player must watch out for Slendrinda, her husband and his two pets. If the player encounters Slendrina he/she must immediately turn around or Slendrina will kill the player and if the player encounter her husband or his two pets the player must run and try to hide.
title: Slendrina X

description: In The Child of Slendrina the player is stuck in a cellar and must find pieces of a key that will open up a safe. While exploring the cellar the player must watch out for Slendrina, her child and her father. If the player encounters Slendrina he/she must immediately turn around or Slendrina will kill the player, but if the player encounters her child or father the player must run and try to hide.

sample_screenshots.caption: I need a special key to open the safe

title: The Child of Slendrina

description: In House of Slendrina the player is in Slendrinas house and needs to get into the cellar to learn the truth about Slendrina. To be able to access the cellar the player needs to find 8 pieces of a picture that will unlock the key cabinet that hold the cellar key. Some doors are locked and the player needs to find keys to unlock them. Keys and pieces of the picture are randomly placed in the house each game. If the player encounters Slendrina he/she must immediately turn around or Slendrina will kill the player.
title: House of Slendrina

description: In Slendrina: The School the player is trapped in an old school where Slendrina used to go when she was young. To escape the player needs to find a certain item that is hidden in the school. While exploring the school the player must watch out for Slendrina. If the player encounters Slendrina he/she must immediately turn around or Slendrina will kill the player.

sample_screenshots.caption: This is where the game starts

title: Slendrina: The School

description: In Slendrina: The Forrest the player needs to find the dark secret that is hidden in the forest. To succeed the player needs to find seven keys that is then used to unlock a coffin. While exploring the forest the player must watch out for Slendrina and her mom. While it is enough to look away from Slendrina to escape from her the player must run and hide from her mother.

sample_screenshots.caption: Slendrinas husband seems to be here too

title: Slendrina: The Forest

description: In Slendrina 2D the player was out for a walk when rain started pouring down from the sky. The player then takes shelter in an an abandon house and decides to explore the house. The house is full of traps so the player must take care while exploring. If the player encounters Slendrina he/she must immediately turn around or Slendrina will kill the player.

sample_screenshots.caption: This is where the game starts
Found the key to the entrance

title: Slendrina 2D

description: In Escape game: Home Town Adventure the player is trapped in his/her old home town and must solve several puzzles to escape. The puzzles that must be solved can be anything from finding hidden objects to arrange bottles in a certain order. If the player gets stuck hints can be bought by the way of micro transactions.

sample_screenshots.caption: The game gives you a hint
I need to reach that key

title: Escape game: Home Town Adventure

description: In Escape game: Prison adventure 2 the player is an inmate in a prison and must solve puzzles to escape. The puzzles can be anything from math problems to click on symbols in the right order. If the player gets stuck hints can be bought using real money. This game is a sequel to Escape game: Prison adventure

sample_screenshots.caption: Interesting that they let a prisoner enter the guard room
This is your cell, where the game starts

title: Escape game: Prison adventure 2

description: Haunted Grandpa House is a survival horror game where the player must escape from grandpa's house. The front door must be unlocked in three steps: first the player needs to use an axe to break the wooden latches that secures the door, then find the door key and finally find the code for the code lock. While exploring the hose the player must watch out for grandpa. The player can use tranquilizer darts to incapacitate grandpa for a short while. The player has five days to escape the house.

sample_screenshots.caption: I knocked out grandpa for a while
My objective is shown in the upper left corner

title: Haunted Grandpa House

description: Horror In Forest - Zombie Killer is a first person shooter where the player kills zombies in five different levels. Once every zombie in an area is killed the player is transported to the next level. As the game goes on, the player gets better weapons. The five areas featured in the game are: "Open field", "Zombie Mountains", "Zombie Nest", "In The Woods" and "Horror World".

sample_screenshots.caption: When it's game over you get an ad for one of the developers other products

title: Horror In Forest - Zombie Killer

description: In Real Car Driving Experience the player may drive one of several cars at three different locations: "Los Saltos City" , "Offroad Hills" and "Looping Airport". The three locations are connected to each other, so the player can drive between them. When the game starts the player has one car, a Maxi5. Additional cars can be earned by driving a certain distance, by using car blueprints or bought with cash or gold. Cars can be upgraded by using parts that can be found in chests spread out in the game. Winning races earns the player cash and gold.

sample_screenshots.caption: Lets see should I go left to the airport or right to the hills?
My car is pretty smashed up

title: Real Car Driving Experience

description: Car In Traffic 2018 is a car game where the player must complete missions to earn money and unlock new zones with even more missions. A mission can for example be to pass a number of checkpoints before the time runs out. In addition to the missions there is also "free mode" where the player drives until he/she crashes the car. The road that the player drives on is always straight with cars moving in one or both directions. Bonus money can be earned by driving against the traffic or passing close to the other cars. The money the player earns can then be spent on buying new, more powerful, cars or upgrade existing cars.

sample_screenshots.caption: Mission 1 is a time trial race

title: CIT 18

description: Space War is a vertical-scrolling shoot-em-up where the player faces wave after wave of alien enemies. Sometimes mines appears in the players path and these can not be destroyed. Now and then a destroyed enemy will reveal a power-up that gives the player a bit more fire power. Other power-ups (such as a shield or a powerful bomb) will appear without destroying enemies. The game features 20 stages and 2 difficulty settings.

sample_screenshots.caption: A shiled power-up to the right

title: Space War

description: Tangled Puzzle in is a mobile puzzle game where players untangle crossed lines by dragging around the connected dots until no lines overlap. Blue dots can be dragged to any position on the screen, Red dots are locked in place and can't be dragged, and yellow dots can only be dragged in the direction indicated by the arrow on them. The game has 30 time based levels and a endless procedural puzzle generator.
title: Tangled Puzzle

description: In Borodach. Pojmaj butylku you play as the character Borodach. The gameplay is similar to Nu, pogodi!. Your goal is catch the bottles that falling from the windows. If the bottle falls down, you lose.
title: Borodach. Pojmaj butylku

description:
Pig Plummet is a simple mobile platformer starring a wheeled, green pig. The pig will move blindly straight forward and your only input is to turn him around by tapping, while the screen scrolls steadily downwards. If he plummets below the edge of the screen, walks off the sides or falls behind the scrolling the game is over.

Gold stars and more rare floating diamonds can be picked up for points as you try to get a high score.As you move further along, additional threats like rockets start to appear.
title: Pig Plummet

description:
Crypts of Death is a role-playing game fully designed for the mobile devices. The story involves an ancient war, and a haunted graveyard, but the main focus of the game is its RPG gameplay and dungeon crawling. The dungeons in the game are completely random-generated each time you visit them, and they range from forests to underground crypts. This gives the game some roguelike features, in addition to the fact that monsters get meaner and bigger the higher your player level is.

The game has some basic features, expected from mobile games, such as a daily spin wheel, which gives you a certain bonus item per day. There are four different playable characters, and they differ with their starting weapon and skills. The RPG mechanics in the game are designed to be intuitive and easy-to-grasp.
title: Crypts of Death

description: Ingenious is a digital version of the board game with the same name by German-style board game designer Reiner Knizia. The game is played on a hexagon shaped board filled with hexagon shaped tiles. The player receives points by placing tiles containing one out of six different symbols on the board and this way forming areas consisting of the same symbol.
title: Ingenious

description: Munch Time is a puzzle platformer in which the player controls a chameleon named Munch, on the search for its lunch. By controlling Munch's tongue, it can latch onto flowers and swing across the level. But this only works with flowers that match the colour of Munch. By eating coloured flies, Munch can change its own colour. In addition there are different flowers with different behaviours. The game consists of 84 levels across four different environments.
title: Munch Time

description:
Tiny Klepto is an isometric roguelike about a burglar breaking into houses and stealing all kinds of stuff.

You have to unlock new districts and upgrade your tools to disable alarms, and pick locked doors and safe boxes. At the same time, you have to avoid being noisy or attracting too much attention from the police.

sample_screenshots.caption: To neutralize the alarm system you have to buy the correct tools. It's fundamental for the last level.
To earn the respect of the master thief, you have to find and steal his old cognac.
It's time to leave. Your backpack is filled with precious objects. I just couldn't leave without a Blade Runner poster.
Your status got raised and you moved to a richer neighbourhood. Now you can rest in a fancier place: an hotel.

title: Tiny Klepto

description: Air Hockey Star is an air hockey game for one or two players. In multiplayer the game can be played over Bluetooth or with two players sharing one device. The game has two game modes: classic and crazy mode. The classic mode works like the table game while the crazy mode ads power ups. These appear on the playing field and the player that first reaches one gets one of five power ups randomly selected. Available power ups include larger goals and additional pucks on the field. There are four game fields and three difficulty levels. The number of sets and required scores can be set ahead of a game.
title: Air Hockey Star

description: In Valakas: Put' domoi - Valakas Escape you play as the Russian streamer's Glad Valas's head. By swiping you must create a path to exit for Glad Valakas.
title: Valakas: Put' domoi - Valakas Escape

description: PecmenGO is a clone of Pac-Man. Like in the original game you must be eat all pills in the level to complete it.
title: PecmenGO

description: Flappy Ball Game is a Flappy Bird variant. You play as a ball. You must fly through the pipes to get points. If you fall, you lose.
title: Flappy Ball Game

description: iLands is a Minecraft clone. You can place or destroy various types of blocks in a 3D environment using a first-person perspective. There is no defined goals as the gameplay is open. Players can explore or build, in the sky, over water or underground.
title: iLands

description: Flappy Plane is a Flappy Bird-clone. You play as Plane, that must fly through the towers or else it exploses and you lose. The main concept of the game is based on infamous event that happened on September 11, 2001.
title: Flappy Plane

description: Geometry Jump Rabbit is a Geometry Dash-clone. The player controls a square-shaped protagonist whose only ability is jumping. If it bumps into something, it dies. The game features 4 levels.
title: Geometry Jump Rabbit

description: Flappy Trump is a clone of Flappy Bird, but instead of a bird, you play as Trump's head. You must fly thought the Mexican walls to get points. If you touch the wall or fall you lose.
title: Flappy Trump

description: Flappy Sanic is a clone of Flappy Bird, but instead of a bird, you play as Sanic. You must fly through the pipes and collect rings to get points. If you touch the pipe or fall you lose.
title: Flappy Sanic

description: Flappy Sanic is a Flappy Bird clone where the player controls Sanic's head. You must fly through the pipes to get points. Falling down or hitting a pipe loses the game.
title: Flappy Sanic

description: Flappy Tube is a Flappy Bird-clone but in Parallel Universes. The player controls the tube by touching on the screen. He must fly through the walls full of birds to get points.
title: Flappy Tube

description: In Beetle Bug you play as ladybug, that must eat mushrooms and bug, collecting coins and avoid caterpillar, plants and trees.
title: Beetle Bug

description:
The Longest Game Ever 2 is a text-based narrative game in which the player faces 7805j, a megalomaniac AI.

The AI's sole objective is to make you give up and uninstall the game. It will use all kinds of creative tortures to convince you to quit and that you stand no chance to ever win.

Features:

  • Megalomaniac AI who thinks he's better than you
  • Nasty NPCs who will make you feel miserable
  • Half-baked mini-games with poor graphics
  • Thousands of levels of content in the main storyline
  • Ascend to the top of the global leaderboard as you progress through the game
title: The Longest Game Ever 2

description: Catch Circle is a 2D platform game about moving a ball through a level to trap it in a cage. There are fifteen levels and players can aim for a top rank by breaking the record for each level.
title: Catch Circle

description:
Rival Wheels is a motorbike drag racing game with gameplay similar to CSR Racing. The game is made up of one-on-one races that are viewed from the side. Forward movement of the bike is automatic with player's controls being limited to revving up the engine, shifting and using nitro boosts. To perform well the player has to aim for good or perfect shifts by shifting up only as the needle reaches the green zone of the tachometer. By shifting well the player's nitro bar fills up. Nitro can be used whenever there is some but when the bar is full an extreme nitro can be used.

The game consists of a career mode that contains four locations (Tokyo, Havana, New York and Back to Tokyo). In each location, the player has to play ladder races to unlock boss races and beat every boss to unlock the next location. After winning a race the player is awarded cash as well as a box with bike parts. Both are needed to upgrade bikes. To get more bike parts, it is also possible to buy boxes with cash or to enter the black market where parts can be bought and sold. By winning boss fights the player is also awarded blueprints which are needed to unlock new bikes. All bikes in the game are licensed from manufacturers such as Kawasaki, Yamaha and Suzuki. In addition to the ladder and boss races, there are also side jobs that can be played for extra rewards and objective-based star tasks which appear after a location have been completed.

sample_screenshots.caption: On the starting line in Havana

title: Rival Wheels

description:
Ships Unite is an action game where the player commands a ship, sailing across stormy waters. The game is seen in a side view. As the ship departs, initially the sea is calm, but this soon changes as increasingly tall waves tilt the ship. If the ship tilts too much, the player loses one life (represented by a crewmember), so to counter this the player must tap arrows on the screen to tilt the ship back and keep it as straight as possible. Occasionally, the player also encounters sea monsters. When the monster attacks the ship, the player must rapidly tap the screen to defeat it, or else he will lose a life. Some types of ships also have weaponry which can be used to shoot the monsters as they appear.

During the journey, crates can be found floating on the sea. By picking up the crates and delivering them to ports along the way, the player earns coins which can be spent to purchase new crew types (with various different abilities). Picking up crates also allows the player to obtain new ships (with differing attributes) or new skins for the ship's captain.
title: Ships Unite

description: Flappy Navalny: Over the Kremlin is a Flappy Bird clone. You play as Alexei Navalny's head. You must fly through the towers of the Kremlin to get points. If you fall or touch something, the game is over.
title: Flappy Navalny: Over the Kremlin

description: Fliproid is a 2D platformer where the player plays as Android's mascot. The main goal is to reach the end of the level without dying. After finishing the level the total score is displayed. The result depends on the number of bonuses collected during the level, time and remaining lives. The game contains four environments with five levels each.
title: Fliproid

description: Morio Vol2 is a Super Mario Bros. clone, but instead of Mario you play as Rhinoceros.
title: Morio Vol2

description:
Geometry Craft: Episode II is the sequel to Geometry Craft: Episode I. Like in the first game the player controls a square-shaped protagonist whose only ability is jumping. If it bumps into something, it dies. The game features three levels:* Desert

  • Ocean
  • Winter
title: Geometry Craft: Episode II

description:
Puzzled Knight is a tile matching game where players match tiles to defeat AI opponents. Players match tiles to perform various actions. Sword tiles fill an attack bar which, when full, performs an attack. Attacks can be blocked by matching shield tiles or negated completely by matching dodge tiles. Gold serves as an in-game currency, while books give the player additional experience points which can be used to level up.

Arcade Mode consists of 36 levels. The opponent difficulty increases with each level. Tournament Mode resets daily and is made up of tjree rounds. The player battles opponents of increasing difficulty to earn a daily prize. Classic Mode does not involve matching tiles to attack opponents. Instead, each level has a required number of matches that need to be made in order to win.
title: Puzzled Knight

description: Fleb Bird is a Flappy Bird clone. You play as bird. You must fly through pipes to get points. If you fall or touch something, the game is over.
title: Fleb Bird

description: Flappy Ball is a Flappy Bird clone. You play as Red Ball. You must fly through pipes to get points. If you fall down or touch something, the game is over.
title: Flappy Ball

description: Square Racing is a top-down racing game where you must avoid cars by moving left or right. The game speed gradually increases, but the speed can also be set from the menu, ranging from one tot fifteen. The game is over as soon as you hit another car.
title: Square Racing

description: Squares Jumping is an auto-runner where you play as a shape. You need reach the end of the level without dying. If you touch something, like a spike or a block, the shape dies and you will have to restart the level. Coins are scattered along the way and can be picked up. They can be used to buy various skins for you shape in the shop. Also, you can buy power-ups, but only with real money. The game contains twelve levels.

sample_screenshots.caption: Playing the second level with a different skin.

title: Squares Jumping

description: Geometry Light is a 2D auto-runner where you play as a square. Your goal is to reach the end of the level without dying. To do this you must jump on blocks and avoid spikes. If you touch something, such as a spike or a blocks, you will have to restart the level. The game contains only one level.
title: Geometry Light

description: Snake Putin is a clone of Snake. You play as Russian present Vladimir Putin in the role of a snake. You must eat everything hat appears in random locations. The more you eat the longer the snake becomes. If you touch the side of the level or touch yourself, the game is over.
title: Snake Putin

description: Klikni s Naval'nym is a simple clicker game. You must click the head of Russian lawyer and political activist Aleksej Anatoljevitsj Navalny to get points. If you have enough points you can purchase clothes for Navalny in the shop.
title: Klikni s Naval'nym

description:
Dungeon Hunter: Curse of Heaven is an entry in the Dungeon Hunter series designed to run on low-end Android smartphones. Unlike the last three games in the series, it's a paid premium title and not free-to-play with in-app purchases. The game's story takes place during the events of Dungeon Hunter 4 and Dungeon Hunter 5 with the player taking the role of a sibling of Syrann, one of the antagonists of Dungeon Hunter 5. As the survivor of a massacre perpetrated by the forces of King Leandro, the player takes on a quest for vengeance.

Like other entries in the Dungeon Hunter series, the game is a hack-n-slash action RPG played from a birds-view perspective. A virtual pad is used to move the player character around the screen while buttons are used to activate attacks, use skills and consume health potions. Two different weapons can be equipped at a time and quickly swapped during combat. There are weapons both for close combat (dual blades, greatswords) and ranged attacks (crossbows, staffs). It is also possible to equip up to three skills which give magical abilities.

The game contains 24 missions that can be accessed from a world map. Each map can be played in three difficulties although only the easiest is initially available, the others have to be unlocked by completing further missions. In each level, there is a portal that when entered starts a challenge where enemies have to be defeated in certain circumstances. There is plenty of loot to collect. Each item has a level that can be increased by fusing it with other items. Once an item has reached its maximum level it can be evolved to a higher tier. All items and enemies can be one of five elements (water, fire, nature, death, light) with each element having a bonus against another element. For example, a water item does extra damage on a fire enemy.

sample_screenshots.caption: Karnivoth - a giant with an enormous mace

title: Dungeon Hunter: Curse of Heaven

description: The Android mascot took Wylsacom's apple. You must get your apple back. WylsaRun is side-scroller game based on the YouTube channel Wylsacom. The player plays as Valentin Petuhov (owner of the channel). Your goal is defeat the main iPhone enemy Android and get your apple back.
title: WylsaRun

description: Jump Bros is 2D platformer. Each level has a certain number of diamonds which can be used to open a portal to the next level. Each world contains fifteen levels. Each world also contains a boss, which the player must defeat to go through to the next world.
title: Jump Bros
Ninja Tag Team: Slash n' Dash

description: Feed the Kitty is a simple game where the player must tap on sushi as it reaches the cats at the bottom of the screen. The sushi appears in lanes leading up to the cats, like the notes in a rhythm game. The speed at which the sushi moves gets faster with each successful tap. Missing a piece of sushi will cause the player to lose one of the cats and reset the speed, if they only have two cats and miss a piece then it's game over. Some pieces of sushi have special effects, such as temporarily slowing the sushi down, speeding them up, cause more sushi to appear, clear all sushi from the screen, and attract an additional cat. There are also rotten fish, which the player must avoid tapping on.
title: Feed the Kitty

description: Simple Memory is a simple card matching game. The player is presented with a selection of face down playing cards and must remove them by matching pairs of cards. They do this by selecting two cards to turn over, if they are the same they are removed, and if they are not they are turned back over.
title: Simple Memory

description: Projectile Guardian is a colourful shoot 'em up defence game. The player can destroy incoming missiles by tapping the screen as they approach a base in the center of the screen, shown from the side with a fixed screen. These missiles are harmless though, so you cannot lose the game. The objective of the game is to kill time instead of the enemies.
title: Projectile Guardian

description:
In Desert Runners the player controls three runners during their journey through the desert. The longer you avoid obstacles (like cacti and bones) the higher your high score will be. You can control the runners by dragging their lanes. Once there is an obstacle on one of the runners’ lane, be sure to drag the runner to a clear lane to avoid a collision.

The goal is to improve your high score.
title: Desert Runners

description: Monster Match is a simple Memory card game. From a deck of sixteen face-down cards, the player flips two cards at a time and two identical cards need to be located. A game is complete when no more cards remain.
title: Monster Match

description:
Gameloft Classics: Arcade is a collection of five J2ME games from Gameloft. All the games use the same frontend which consists of a virtual d-pad and four action buttons with the game itself being rendered in a window that retains the game's original vertical screen orientation. The games included in the compilation are:

  • Block Breaker 2 Deluxe
  • Brain Challenge 2: Think Again!
  • Bubble Bash 2
  • Diamond Rush
  • Miami Nights 2: The City is Yours
title: Gameloft Classics: Arcade

description:
Gameloft Classics: Action is a collection of five J2ME games from Gameloft. All the games use the same frontend which consists of a virtual d-pad and four action buttons with the game itself being rendered in a window that retains the game's original vertical screen orientation. The games included in the compilation are:

  • Gangstar 2
  • Hero of Sparta
  • Motocross: Trial Extreme
  • Soul of Darkness
  • Zombie Infection
title: Gameloft Classics: Action

description:
Gameloft Classics: Shooters is a collection of five J2ME games from Gameloft. All the games use the same frontend which consists of a virtual d-pad and four action buttons with the game itself being rendered in a window that retains the game's original vertical screen orientation. The games included in the compilation are:

  • Alien Quarantine
  • Modern Combat 2: Black Pegasus
  • N.O.V.A.
  • Wild West Guns
  • Zombiewood
title: Gameloft Classics: Shooters

description:
Gameloft Classics: Love is a collection of five J2ME games from Gameloft. All the games use the same frontend which consists of a virtual d-pad and four action buttons with the game itself being rendered in a window that retains the game's original vertical screen orientation. The games included in the compilation are:

  • Date or Ditch 2
  • Fashion Icon
  • High School Hook Ups
  • My Life in New York
  • Vampire Romance

sample_screenshots.caption: High School Hook Ups - Title screen
Mu Life in New York - Title screen
Mu Life in New York - In-game

title: Gameloft Classics: Love

description:
Gameloft Classics: Puzzles is a collection of three J2ME games from Gameloft. All the games use the same frontend which consists of a virtual d-pad and four action buttons with the game itself being rendered in a window that retains the game's original vertical screen orientation. The games included in the compilation are:

  • Abracadaball
  • Block Breaker 3 Unlimited
  • Platinum Solitaire 3
title: Gameloft Classics: Puzzles

description:
Gameloft Classics: Prime Games Collection is a compilation of 30 J2ME games. Most of the games are also available in other Gameloft Classics compilations (Action, Arcade, Love, Puzzles, Shooters). Unlike those releases, this collection uses a free-to-play model where the player buys coins which each gives five minutes of play-time in any of the games. Coins can be bought individually or in subscriptions but it is also possible to buy games for unlimited play.

In 2020 the collection was re-released in a fully free version called Gameloft Classics: 20 Years which coincided with Gameloft's 20 year anniversary.

The included games are:

  • Abracadaball
  • Alien Quarantine
  • Avalanche Snowboarding
  • Block Breaker 2 Deluxe
  • Block Breaker 3 Unlimited
  • Brain Challenge 3: Think Again!
  • Bubble Bash 2
  • Cannon Rats
  • Date or Ditch 2
  • Detective Ridley and Mysterious Enigma
  • Diamond Rush
  • Fashion Icon
  • Gangstar 2: Kings of L.A.
  • Hero of Sparta
  • Hook Ups High School
  • KO Fighters
  • Miami Nights 2: The City is Yours
  • Midnight Bowling 3
  • Midnight Pool 4
  • Modern Combat 2: Black Pegasus
  • Motocross: Trial Extreme
  • My Life in New York
  • N.O.V.A.: Near Orbit Vanguard Alliance
  • Platinum Solitaire 3
  • Soul of Darkness
  • Texas Hold 'Em Poker
  • Vampire Romance
  • Wild West Guns
  • Zombie Infection
  • Zombiewood
title: Gameloft Classics: Prime Games Collection

description: Slide Puzzle is a simple puzzle game in the sliding puzzle genre. The player must slide the pieces around until the picture is fully formed correctly.
title: Slide Puzzle

alternate_titles.title: Kitty Collector Fish: Cats Are Cute in the Bubble

description: Hoppy Bird is a Flappy Bird clone. The player plays as bird. Flying through pipes the player gets the point. Falling or touching something, the game is over.
title: Hoppy Bird

description: Lost Knight is a 2D Action RPG game shown from a side view in which you have to guide a knight through multiple dark forests. The knight encounters demons, monsters and other creatures.
title: Lost Knight

alternate_titles.title: Trading Merchant Caravan: Trade Resources Game

description: Caravan is a trading game where you have to buy, sell and trade resources in order to grow your business. Choose the best strategy and try to optimize your actions to be the richest merchant at the end of your journey. You can recruit traders to earn you money every day and add camels to your crew to carry more resources. But be careful, don't let them die of hunger. A journey in the Bajaar's Desert is not easy.
title: Caravan

description: Break 5 is a simple tile-matching puzzle game. The player starts with three rows of five squares at the bottom which they must clear for points. Selecting a block will remove it and all adjacent blocks of the same colour and cause any un-removed blocks above it to fall down. If the fallen blocks connect to at least five blocks of the same colour after falling, those blocks are removed as well. After each time the player removes a block, a new row of five blocks is added to the bottom of the stack. If the stack reaches the top of the screen, then the game ends.
title: Break 5

description: Overlock is a free mobile puzzle game where the player is presented with a selection of overlapping shapes and move them so that none of them are overlapping. The shapes can only be moved in predetermined ways which the player does by tapping them. It starts off with shapes that rotate 90 degrees when they are tapped, then adds additional mechanics with each sequence of levels. There are 5 sequences of levels with 6-7 puzzles each, and total of 32 puzzles altogether.
title: Overlock

description: Flux Rush is a free infinite runner style game with a puzzle twist. The player, represented by a triangle, automatically moves along four lanes which the player switch between using arrows at the bottom of the screen. The lanes have walls which the player must avoid and gold cubes to collect for points, but they can't do so just by switching between lanes. In order to succeed the player must reorganise the position of the four lanes by dragging them to where they want them to be.
title: Flux Rush

description: Simple Solitaire is a standard adaption of the classic card game Klondike. The player can change whether one or three cards are drawn from the deck at a time, as well as customise the background and card backs.
title: Simple Solitaire

description: Prism Prison is a puzzle game where the player is given a selection of coloured nodes split into two rings, which they have to match up with the pattern at the top of the screen. The player can do this by rotating the rings around, and by "colour switching", which causes either two primary colour nodes to merge into a secondary colour node, or a secondary coloured node to split into two primary coloured ones.
title: Prism Prison

description: Bully Bash Basketball is an endless runner where the player controls a basketball wielding kid who runs through the streets in order to get back all the shoes that have been stolen by bullies from a rival town. The player controls the game by swiping left or right to switch between three lanes and to go around corners, and by swiping up to jump. The player must avoid various obstacles littering the streets, and collect coins, power-ups, and the stolen shoes along the way.
title: Bully Bash Basketball

description:
They Live to Destroy! is a free VR game with an exaggerated humorous 1980's horror ambience where players build and manage a science institute on an island. Through the construction of buildings and upgrades, and the management of resources, engineers are acquired as a resource to unlock new buildings and upgrades, and generate resources. Once the basic infrastructure is up and running, up to 40 Kaiju monsters who pass by the island every now and then can be tamed and captured. All collected monsters are stored in a catalog. They have different statistics and levels that can be upgraded.

With a few monsters a campaign battle can be started as the player plans a path on a map with hexagonal tiles. A city is destroyed by capturing a number of waypoints, but on the way other monsters are encountered. After the planning phase the battles are played out automatically, but the player can enter the city with a first-person view and watch the events acting as a photographer snapping pictures. Next to the main campaign battle there are online battles against other players.
title: They Live to Destroy!

description: In Down the Zig Zag Road, you're always moving forward. You must tap the screen to shift to the left and/or right so as to avoid the sides of the road and any oncoming obstacles. Go for as long as you can to get the highest score you can.
title: Down the Zig Zag Road

description: SSuper Brick Escape the Box is a sliding block puzzle game. Move the various blocks around so as to clear a path for the red block to reach the exit.
title: Super Brick Escape the Box

description: Little Red Sliding Hood is a sliding tile puzzle game. Slide the tiles around the screen so as to create a path for Red to get to Grandma's house.
title: Little Red Sliding Hood

description: Sweet Sugar Hexa Puzzle is puzzle game. You are shown a shape made of hexagons. Below this are hexagon clusters. You must arrange the clusters so that every hexagon space is filled. There will be no leftover spaces and the clusters do not overlap.
title: Sweet Sugar Hexa Puzzle

description:
Gem Eater is a mobile puzzle game where you control a snake that lives underground and has to eat gems.

You score points based on the gem color, the more you eat the same color, the more it becomes worth. Strategically deciding which gem to eat next is key to victory. The more you eat, the more impassible clocks will fall down that will eventually trap you, unless you can clear the stage. Stages are cleared by reaching a target score within the allotted time, and without getting trapped.
title: Gem Eater

description:
Paint and Go is a coloring game for children with dinosaurs. Players paint the dinosaurs to bring them to life. It can be played as a game where a finished sample needs to be matched, with a score system based on the correct choices, or with a free system where any colour can be used to still pass the game.

There are six dinosaurs in total, a spot the difference mini-game and a cartoon that is displayed each time one of the six dinosaurs is fully painted. Players can reset progress at any time to start over.
title: Paint and Go

description:
Hidden Oxygen is an atom arranger puzzle game. The player's goal is to figure out the correct layout of oxygen atoms on a square board. By understanding of the board, the next, correct move can be deduced.

There are a number of rules. Oxygen atoms cannot be adjacent to each other, even diagonally. Numbers next to rows and columns tell how many oxygens should be in them. Each carbon atom needs two adjacent oxygens.
title: Hidden Oxygen

description: Smash It All is a game where you need to smash an object. The game is played from a first-person perspective and items such hammers and crowbars are used. Each level has a new type of object and a specific objectives need to be met, such as destroying an item against a time limit, with a limited amount of heads, only hitting specific parts and so on.
title: Smash It All

description: PicsX4 is a 4 pics one-word game where you try to find a particular word that is common to the four given pictures. The challenge becomes harder with each new level. The available letters are shown at the bottom of the screen. The letters need to be added manually. It is possible to get a hint or ask a friend for help and both require a coins currency. Hints include exposing a letter, removing letters and solving the question right away.
title: PicsX4

description: Tahu Bulat is a game marketed towards the Indonesian market. It is inspired by a real food truck business in Indonesia that sells round tofu, which is called Tahu Bulat. It is a clicker/idle game where the goal is to earn profits to invest to expand the food truck and its business. By serving customers the money can be invested in facility upgrades such as a TV, speakers, a tent or a car. The tofu recipe can be improved so prices for the good can be raised. There are also different options to promote the business and expand with new branches to build a tofu empire. The game has various mini-games and a challenge system with other game modes.
title: Tahu Bulat

description: DarkSword is simple platformer game with RPG elements, where the player must defeat enemies, collect gems and upgrade stuff.
title: DarkSword

description:
Colorful Ball is a puzzle that requires ingenuity and skill. You control a ball that can change color. You need the correct color to be able to go through the correct walls and get to the next checkpoint. You will find turrets that will shoot at different times and that you will have to go over to get their color.

You will also get different skills that will be useful to solve the challenges.
title: Colorful Ball

description: Reader Rabbit traverses across a number of different 3D Lanes collecting coins, power-ups and bonus items, while dodging hazards. The player can choose any of the four types of arithmetic equations and the range of numbers that appear in the equations. Answering equations correctly in a limited time allows Reader to travel safely across the current lane till he makes it to the finishing point.
title: Reader Rabbit Math Race

description: Lasercrash is a 2D top-down, vertically-scrolling shooter with with touch-screen controls. You control a space ship and fly through an asteroid belt, trying to avoid getting smashed. The game keeps track of the high score.
title: Lasercrash

description: Le Responsable is a satirical life sim game from Cameroonian developer Kiro'o Games. Set in the fictional "very very democratic republic of Mboa", this sendup of African politics puts players in the shoes of a very ordinary man stepping into his first week on the job in the General Ministry of His Excellency Mougabiang. Players make countless choices over the course of their careers, from whether to follow a corrupt or honest path in politics to where to spend their time and money at night, with many different branching story paths.
title: Le Responsable

description:
Archwar: Heroes and Demons is a MOBA (Multiplayer Online Battle Arena) game for 3-vs-3 players with a fantasy setting.

The background story tells of a magic 'Aether' raining down on different areas on the Earth, after which seven soverign rulers called 'Archlords' try to control those areas where the most of this 'gem' resource has fallen. This results in the 'Archwar' where you as a player join up with other online players, enrolling NPC characters and battle it out against other factions player groups. You have recruitable heroes or demons, character and item upgrades to be purchased based on the success of previous battles. In-game 'Realm-qualifyers' lets you partake in an Archwars e-sport scene.

The game modes are:* PVP: two-player arena brawling battles

  • CTF: 3vs3 teams collect five gems from a center location on the map and deliver those to a home base altar.
  • Team vs Team: 3vs3 attempt to gather eight gems for the team in an area without being forced to drop them by the other team.
title: Archwar: Heroes and Demons

description: Jogo da Forca is a digital adaptation of the Hangman game, for this version in Brazilian Portuguese. With a limited number of tries a word needs to be guessed, letter per letter. There are different categories to choose from. The game is free and does not contain in-app purchases.
title: Jogo da Forca

description: Boxel is an auto-running single button 2D platformer. In the game the player controls a box and must tap on the touchscreen to jump in order to jump over platforms and avoid spikes. The game features a total of 30 levels, 15 in the initial release and 15 added in subsequent updates.
title: Boxel
Car Delivery Service 90s: Open World Driving

description: Heroes of 71 is a third-person cover based shooter centered around the Liberation War of Bangladesh in 1971. Sponsored by the Bangladeshi government with a lot of patriotic sentiments, players take the side of the common people who fought the Armed Force of Pakistan during a liberation war that took nine months. Between the missions there are animated cut-scenes that focus mostly on the atrocities performed by the Pakistani fighters. During the game it is possible to switch between different characters, each holding different positions.
title: Heroes of 71

description:
Cyclone 2000 is an open source Tempest 2000 clone released for Android devices.

Players need to shoot enemies which appear on the web before the enemies shoot or catch up with the player. Some enemies will drop power-ups that will improve the player's weapon, add an AI controlled second player or will allow players to jump, avoid contact and destroy the enemies that the player missed the chance to shoot before and that freely chase them. These power-ups can be turned off in the options menu. There's also a move that can be used once per level and which will wipe out all of the enemies visible on stage.

The game offers an option to download the music from the game it's inspired by.
title: Cyclone 2000

description:
The Impossible Ninja Escape is a hardcore puzzle platformer. Guide the ninja through over a dozen labyrinths filled with saw blades, lasers and turrets. Grab the key and reach the door to end the level, but try to pick up as much gold as you can on the way for extra points. You have a limited supply of invincibility shields and slow-motion power-ups to help you through the tricky gauntlets.

There are fifteen different levels (plus tutorial levels), and three different difficulties for 45 challenges in total.
title: The Impossible Ninja Escape

description:
When using Google Play without an internet connection, users will be prompted to try to reconnect or notify the user when the internet connection is restored. A new option will also be available and that is to play a mini-game while waiting for the internet to start working again.

The game in question is called Hot Air Balloon and it involves dragging the hot air balloon left or right, collecting bubbles to have more points and avoiding spikes which lead to a game over on contact.

The speed of the air balloon is constantly increasing and the game also has a few power-ups players can get.

All power-ups last for a limited time and are as follows:

  • Getting the magnet will attract bubbles to the hot air balloon.
  • Getting the color changing bubble with a thunderbolt inside it will make the hot air balloon flash in various colors, as well as become invincible.
  • Getting the stationery will slow down the speed of the hot air balloon while adding a bullet time effect to its movement.

sample_screenshots.caption: After picking up the stationery, we get a cool slo-mo effect.

title: Google Play (included game)

description:
Rehla is a 3D RPG with an Arabic setting. Battles are turn based and the game has puzzles to solve in some of its dungeons.

Players take control of Masud, a 20 year old boy whose father had just passed away. Masud receives the will his father left with the mosque’s Imam. His father mentions that he has a friend in Sadir area in Najd, thousands of kilometers away. Masud ultimately decides to brave the harsh Aldahna dunes elements to honor his father’s last wishes and meet that old friend.
title: Rehla

description:
Xeonjia is best described as the icy pathway nagivation in games such as Pokémon spun off into a separate game.

Players swipe their fingers to move the protagonist across the ice and the protagonist will keep moving until he bumps into any kind of obstacle.

There are two modes in this game: Story mode*, where the objective is to defeat the villain and save a kingdom.

  • Multiplayer mode where players score points for their team to win.
title: Xeonjia

description:
Fap Ninja is fast-paced tap-to-fap hentai game that includes more than 35 over-the-top mini sex games, original hentai artwork, and authentic Japanese voice acting.

It features Fap Ninja, a sexy ninja on a quest to achieve the ultimate orgasm. T.E.N.T.A, Tiny Erotic Ninja Tentacle Assistant, her fiercely loyal octopus pet monster, and Hot Horny Honzo, the legendary samurai and sex toy maker, accompany her on her mission, providing assistance and crafting the world’s most coveted sex toys.

sample_screenshots.caption: Swipe to cum on her face

title: Fap Ninja
Mega Ramps Ultimate Car Jumping: Impossible Drive

description: Quick Logic Puzzles is a mobile logic grid puzzle game. It includes hints, multi-level undo, and the ability to maintain notes.
title: Quick Logic Puzzles

description: Alchemy Classic HD is a mobile version of the Alchemy game in which the goal is to make as many materials starting with the four basic elements.
title: Alchemy Classic HD

alternate_titles.description: Android Google Play product page title
alternate_titles.title: Fighting Kuro Obi Karate

description: Escape: The Cabin is a small escape game. You awake inside a cabin with a locked door. Solve the puzzles inside the room to get the key and find your way out.
title: Escape: The Cabin

description: Floppy Swap is a classic Match-three game. Instead of using the average candies, fruits, jewels or gems it uses all kinds of storage media as playstones. It comes with a UI that serves as a homage to the Commodore C64 computer.
title: Floppy Swap

description: Age of History: Africa is a Grand Strategy game, part of the Age of History series. It includes a detailed map of Africa for the player to conquer. The goal is to defeat all of your opponents and take over Africa.
title: Age of History: Africa

description: Lineage M is a mobile port of the original Lineage MMO from 1998. While based on the fantasy world established in the Lineage franchise, Lineage M expands on the core fiction with the introduction of new classes and battles, including its large-scale 4th anniversary Lineage M: The Elmor release in July 2021. The newest content includes a vast new territory and The Reaper - a powerful new player class.
title: Lineage M

description:
PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds Mobile: Marching is an alternative version of PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds for the mobile market. It was short-lived, most likely never left the open beta phase and was only available for the Chinese market and some other countries. Tencent was responsible for both mobile versions of the game and the separate versions were most likely create to work around the game's approval process in China.

While the differences between both mobile versions are not entirely clear, the core concept of the game is identical. It is a battle royale game focusing on gunplay where the last man standing wins. This separately developed version has different content and is known to be lighter than the other version, making it accessible on phones with less powerful hardware.
title: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds Mobile: Marching

description: Fappy Bird is one of many Flappy Bird variants. The game uses a similar graphical style. Coins can be collected to purchase new skins.
title: Fappy Bird

description: Uciana is a grand strategy empire-building 4X game, patterned after the venerable Master of Orion II. Like its inspiration, it is turn-based and features procedural galaxy generation, resource management, starship fleet combat, and other similar hallmarks of space 4X games. It features hot-seat multiplayer play for up to six players.
title: Uciana

description: Train Stop is a puzzle game where the player has to draw the railroad tracks for multiple trains on a single level to make them reach them reach the destination without causing accidents or derailments with the other trains. Along the way coins can be collected. There are fifteen types of train and additional skins can be unlocked. The game is played from a top-down view, but there is also a free camera to view the scene from any perspective, also zooming in entirely or using a first-person perspective as the train driver.
title: Train Stop

description: The release of Android 11 contains a mini-game as an easter egg similar to the one in Android Nougat. A first part of the easter egg requires you to unlock a cat emoji as a toast message. Once unlocked, a mini-game can be played by accessing a new menu called Cat Controls. It lets your feed your cat by filling the empty food bowl, water it by filling a water bubbler, and a toy to attract the cat. Each control is a mini-tutorial on how to control smart home stuff from the new power menu.
title: Android 11 (included games)

description: Idle Hustle Kingdom is an idle/clicker game where you get to be king and manage a kingdom. Collect cards featuring various workers and servants to help you run and improve the production of your realm. Complete enough tasks to reach the next level, where you restart your kingdom but unlock further tasks and gain bonuses.
title: Idle Hustle Kingdom

description:
The arch-demon Caesar lives a hedonistic but ultimately stagnant life from atop his throne in Hell, quickly becoming bored of bedding the same women and being surrounded by the same dull minions every day. His luck changes when, while searching for new concubines, he stumbles upon a set of ancient relics housing the spirits of arch-demons past, who impart their power unto him to aid him in conquering the world. Empowered by his renewed vitality, Caesar sets out on a quest to conquer the territories - and women - of the other kingdoms of Hell and the realms beyond.

TenkafuMA! is a hentai turn-based role-playing game with gacha elements. As Caesar, players form a team of up to five characters with varying skills to clear stages by fighting enemy teams. In each turn, each unit can be set to either attack (which deals damage to the enemy) or defend (which reduces the damage received by the unit in the enemy's turn). Once certain conditions are met, characters can also use an Ultimate Skill which is significantly more powerful than their standard skills. Characters are attributed one of five elements (Fire, Wind, Water, Light, and Darkness), which determines their effectiveness against characters of other elements. New characters can be acquired via a gacha system where the player can spend virtual or real-world currency to gain a random selection of characters from a pre-determined pool.

There are several other game modes in addition to the main campaign as well as unique quests from periodic updates and events. One such game mode is the Demon Spire, which contains stages with special challenges. Outside of combat, the player can use items to level up their characters or 'discipline' them with sex toys to unlock sex scenes.
title: TenkafuMA!

description:
Idle Girls is an idle/clicker game where you manage a hotel full of beautiful women. The basic gameplay consists of waiting for the girls to provide you "kisses" (the basic currency of the game) enough to level up her room, after which she will provide more kisses and so on. Eventually you will have collected enough to unlock a new room with a new girl, or eventually a whole new hotel building.

If progress is stalled you can close the hotel for the night and begin a new day. This will close all the rooms again and reset their level, but will grant you a special "hearts" currency.

There are also mini-games: a date game where you have to answer her questions appropriately in order to seduce her; a simple card guessing game; and a slots machine where you can win rewards.
title: Idle Girls

description:
Final Destiny: Beyond the End of the World is a side scrolling hack 'n' slash action RPG.

A wandering female warrior comes across a orphaned baby after a battle. Deciding to take him with her she names him Corrin. She must now try to protect it as she makes her way through the war torn and monster-filled lands.

Basic movement consists of walking left to right, double-tapping to run, attacking, or doding (with a short cool-down). Special attacks, potions and summoned creatures can also be equipped, as can a wide range of armor and weapons. Attacks and special attacks can be stringed together into various combos.

If hit by a strong attack Corrin might be dropped; he must then be retrieved before being able to attack again.

Slain enemies frequently drop gold coins or equipment. Unwanted equipment can be sold, or disassemle for scrap ores, in between stages.

Back in camp you can also upgrade gear, change skill loadouts, or mine safely for ores.

The journey goes through several lands, divided into numerous stages each, accessible from a world map. Each level has the goal to simply defeat all the enemies in it, sometimes headed by a boss monster or two. Occasionally you'll come across a puzzle room where a skill tome can be retrieved by solving some simple cipher puzzle.
title: Final Destiny: Beyond the End of the World

description:
Lumberjack Attack is an idle game. Your lumberjack will move automatically forward, battling any creatures he encounters with his axe until he eventually gets defeated himself, getting sent back to the last checkpoint (every 20 waves). Gold dropped by monsters is used for unlocking and upgrading your stats, abilities, magical spells and magical fairies which help the lumberjack.

Rarer gems can be spent on special, permanent upgrades, or for temporary boosts. Broken crystals gotten from bosses require "prestiging" to repair, which moves you back to wave 1 and resets all upgrades bought with gold, but the now whole crystal can be used to gain special bonuses for next run.
title: Lumberjack Attack!

description:
Blue Square Gals is a fast-paced whac-a-mole style arcade puzzle game. Presented with a table of 9 colored squares, the goal is to turn all the squares blue within a time limit. Tapping a square will cycle it through the colors red - green - yellow - blue. You have to be quick, however, as the squares will also randomly cycle on their own, and tapping a blue square will induct a penalty.

Succeeding in turning all the squares blue will earn you points as well as refill some time. Bonus or penalty items may also spawn on a square, depending on the selected difficulty.

There are four difficulty modes, each accompanied by a different girl:

  • Easy - bonus items only
  • Normal - bonus and penalty items
  • Hard - no items
  • Hardest - penalty items only
title: Blue Square Gals

description:
Bob's World is a free-to-play Super Mario Bros. clone for Android. As Bob, run and jump through the levels to rescue the princess.

Evil mushrooms, snails and other creatures cross your path, but Bob can jump on their heads to defeat them.

Blocks with a heart symbol can be bumped with your head to reveal their contents; either coins or a power-up such as a potion (makes Bob bigger and stronger), a bomb to throw at enemies or a shield that makes you temporarily invincible. Coins are kept between levels and can be exchanged for power-ups. Spare power-ups can be kept in storage, to be used when needed.

There are ten worlds to complete, each divided into 16 levels. Some levels change up the pace by taking place under water, making Bob swim through them.

sample_screenshots.caption: Bump blocks for coins and other items

title: Bob's World

description: Cyber Knights is an RPG set in a futuristic cyberpunk setting. The player assumes the role of a cyber knight, an elite mercenary offering his or her skills to the highest bidder. The game features in-depth character development and tactical turn-based combat with multiple party members.
title: Cyber Knights

description: Age of Pirates is a piracy-themed RPG. It is set in an age-of-sail inspired fantasy setting and the player gets to command a pirate ship and explore the seas, either peacefully trading or violently raiding the vessels of other merchants. The core gameplay loop is very similar to the classic Sid Meier's Pirates!, but the fantasy setting keeps the formula fresh by adding some elements of magic to the game.
title: Age of Pirates

description: Templar Assault is a tactical turn-based RPG. Set in a sci-fi world inspired by Warhammer 40,000, the player controls a group of templars fighting against various aliens. The game is structured into levels where the player has to overcome challenging combat encounters and keep his templars alive to fight another day, while making sure all the aliens are exterminated. The player's templars are strong and resilient but not very fast, meaning that defensive approaches to tactics are usually preferred over extensive maneuvering. Fights usually happen in tight spaces, making chokepoint control an important aspect of gameplay.
title: Templar Assault

alternate_titles.title: Attack of the Ghastly Grey Matter!

description: Giovanni's Nightmare is a side-scrolling 2D platformer for mobile, where the player assumes the role of Italian chef Giovanni who's stuck in a nightmare and has to wake up by getting to the end of the levels. It was released as freeware and features 24 levels to go through.
title: Giovanni's Nightmare

alternate_titles.title: Oggy and the Cockroaches: Go - World of Racing

description: Age of History: Americas is a Grand Strategy game, part of the Age of History series. The goal is to defeat all of your opponents and take over the Americas.
title: Age of History: Americas

description:
Music in Motion is a game used in healthcare providing activities designed to improve the patient’s attitude about rehabilitation and ROM exercises using music-and rhythm-based activities. Using visual scanning, trunk control, and bilateral shoulder movements, patients can engage in musically driven exercises. Patients must coordinate body movements timed to music to receive rewards and visualize their progress from session to session.

The game is part of the REAL Immersive System y-Series offering a hub of different activities of which Music in Motion is one. The platform is built around a modified HTC Vive Focus (a virtual reality helmet) which the patient uses, paired with an Android tablet which the therapist uses to guide the experience. It is only meant to be used with a therapist present.
title: Music in Motion

description: Santa Christmas Delivery 2020 is an arcade-style game for Android. It is Christmas Eve and Santa Claus is out delivering presents to all the children. However, the Grinch is trying to steal all of the presents out of Santa's sleigh. The player must guide Santa to each of the children's houses while avoiding the Grinch, who is in pursuit. If the sleigh is hit, it will take damage. This is an endless game where the player tries to get the highest score they can.
title: Santa Christmas Delivery 2020

description: Alpha Wave is a fast, colorful game in the style of classic arcade shooters. There are 65 waves of enemies, spread over 3 levels. The various types of enemies have different behavior patterns. Boss opponents appear at regular intervals. Players can compete against each other on a leader board.
title: Alpha Wave

description: Can You Escape: Adventure is a mobile game that imitates real life escape rooms. Players find themselves in various differently themed locations from which they must escape. This is achieved by tapping on visible objects, combining them with other objects and solving puzzles. Can You Escape: Adventure features 18 different levels, ranging from museums and storerooms to caves and huts.
title: Can You Escape: Adventure

description: Pimp My Water Gun is a tile-based modular 2D squirt gun builder. It is equal parts drawing app and scale model kit "kitbashing" simulator. The player selects stock parts from a library and arranges them in builds on a canvas. The game encourages sharing of designs with friends, online and offline, for creative competition. For solo designers, the app features light gamification and will tell players how "cool" their design is.
title: Pimp My Water Gun

description: Holy Ship! is a pirate-themed idle RPG. Players sail the high seas, defeat sea monsters, rescue crew, and amass lots of treasure. There are different cute animal pirates to collect. Battle skills can be equipped to help sink other boats at sea. Earn gold even if you're away. Return to port to start your journey again, but stronger.
title: Holy Ship!

description: Puzzle Cats is a puzzle game where the object is to arrange blocks shaped like, and which have the appearance of, cats so that the blocks cover the entire area of the playing field. But be warned, because the longer it takes to solve a puzzle, the angrier the cats get! As the player clears puzzles and levels up, the difficulty increases, but new cats can be unlocked for play. The player can also unlock costumes for the cats to wear. If the player doesn't like cats, he/she can also reskin the blocks to a more traditional form; those blocks can also take on new looks as puzzles are completed.
title: Puzzle Cats

description: Stardust Hyperdrive is a top-down endless shooter where you fly through space shooting space ships and bosses while dodging their attacks.
title: Stardust Hyperdrive

description: Moon Whalers is a top-down endless shooter where you guide your boat through space, dodging bullets, and fight space whales.
title: Moon Whalers

description:
This is a super fun trivia game quiz which can help

☆ Practice Basic Maths operations ☆ Maths, Science, general aptitude, reasoning and logical puzzles to speed up calculation skills ☆ Play addition, subtraction, multiplication, division ☆ Tackle Statistics like average, mean, median ☆ Crack complex math concepts like sequence and series. ☆ Logical puzzles of Percentage, Simple and Compound Interest, Profit & Loss ☆ Logical puzzles of Age, Calendar, Clock, Fractions and Logarithm ☆ Logical puzzles of Average, Chain Rule, Time & Work, Time & Distance ☆ Logical puzzles of Logical puzzles of Missing Number, Area & Volume, Permutation & Combination, Probability ☆ Earth and Space ☆ Stars and Planets ☆ Solar System ☆ Galaxies and Blackholes ☆ Nobel Prize winners and inventions ☆ Sun and Moon ☆ Social science ☆ Life science ☆ Physical science ☆ Inventions and Discoveries ☆ Famous scientists ☆ Mathematics logic ☆ Algebra ☆ Geometry ☆ Physics ☆ Chemistry ☆ Biology ☆ Astronomy ☆ Geoscience

PLAY INSTRUCTIONS

☆ Select Language (English / Hindi / Tamil / Telugu / Kannada) ☆ Yes / No Answer to question within preset seconds ☆ Wrong Answer leads to Loss of Life ☆ 50% Correct Answer enables player to clear Level ☆ Bonus Points awarded if player answers before Time ☆ 3 Star Level Rating awarded ☆ Win the Ultimate Genius Gold Medal ☆ Player can Replay Level to earn Extra Stars

GK quiz game: game trivia features:

☆ Multilingual (English / Hindi / Tamil / Telugu / Kannada) ☆ Star Ratings awarded for Level ☆ Timed challenge with graded difficulty levels
title: Super Fun Maths Science Quiz

description: Army Vs Aliens defense is an action game where you can play humans or aliens. The goal is to kill enemies before they are able to reach your tower. Enemies can have 2 colors and the player has to switch the color of his weapons to inflict damages to them. More you kill enemies, more you win points to perform on the worldwide leaderboard.
title: Army Vs Aliens Defense

description: Draw a Line is a physics based puzzle game. Players need to find a way to cross to the other side with a truck by drawing a line.
title: TurtleMan

description: Start your own cult in Underhand! Your job as a cult leader is to manage the resources of the cult, and how you respond to the events decides its success.
title: Underhand
Devil May Cry: Peak of Combat

description:
Awesome Pizza Tycoon! is a managerial game where the player starts a small-scale food business and is tasked with selling pizza slices for profit. The game is similar in tone and gameplay to titles such as Lemonade Tycoon.

The player must decide on a recipe by balancing the amount of flour, cheese, and pepperoni, set a price for a slice, purchase the right amount of ingredients, and buy and upgrade equipment that lets them serve their customers better.

There are six locations to trade from, each with their own customer preferences.

sample_screenshots.caption: Lots of customers, most of them unhappy. Good times!
End of day summary. $9.9 in my pocket!

title: Awesome Pizza Tycoon!

sample_screenshots.caption: Increased paddle speed after a power-up
Three points lost against an enemy.
Three points scored against an enemy.

description: During an expedition, Professor Baboo and his favorite student Dorothy are lost inside the Khafre Pyramid, stumbling across a statue of Anubis and becoming afflicted by the god of the dead's curse. The player must navigate one character at a time through the pyramid rooms dodging enemies, solving puzzles, hiding in places and transforming into another animal. The player must avoid the pyramid mummy, otherwise the character will be mummified.
title: Professor Baboo

description: Gidi Run is an endless runner game set on the streets of Lagos, Nigeria. The player takes on the role of various characters like a bus conductor, a police officer and even a danfo bus. The protagonist must collect coins, avoid obstacles and jump ramps. The game was a flagship title for the MTN Game+ service, where users could download the game by texting "GIDI" to 2200 on their phones.
title: Gidi Run

description:
Dancing Obu Chō Aniki is a rhythm game in the long-running Chō Aniki series. Players can have Adon, Samson, Idaten, Benten or Uminin dance to the music heard in the previous Chō Aniki games.

Notes scroll down towards the bottom of the screen in four columns and players must tap and hold the correct notes to play along with the music. The better the timing, the more points are earned, but if a certain number of notes are missed then the song fails. The music is accompanied by the characters dancing along to it. Clearing songs provides new dance moves.

In addition to the main gameplay, there are gacha mechanics that reward players with clothes for the characters.
title: Dancing Obu Chō Aniki

description: A wormhole has taken you to unknown planets, from where you are trying to escape. Controlling a rocket space ship shown from a side view, you have to collect as much energy as possible to open new wormholes that will get you home.
title: Little Rocket Adventure

description: Digikin Pocket Adventures is a game developed for Samsung Kids mode. It is aimed at children aged 8 to 12. Players need to find the characters hiding in an environment before the time runs out.
title: Digikin Pocket Adventures

description:
GROW PACK Vol.1 is a compilation of eight games, mostly in the GROW series. Originally released for free, they were bundled in this commercial release because the developer ran out of funds to keep producing them. The included games are:

  • GROW Cube
  • GROW Jungle
  • GROW Ornament
  • GROW Park
  • GROW Recovery
  • GROW RPG
  • Neighbours
  • Tontoko Family
title: GROW PACK Vol.1

description:
The Colored Path is a puzzle game in which the goal is to reproduce a path by swiping in the correct order across tiles placed on a grid. Earlier levels require touching each tile only once, but later in the game you have to pass over some areas several times.

The game contains 220 levels and offers an alternative set of tile graphics for colorblind players.
title: The Colored Path

description: Pulsar Armada is a 2D, top-down, vertically-scrolling shooter set in space. The player controls a spaceship and takes out enemies.
title: Pulsar Armada

description: 52 Pickup Plus is a card game. All 52 cards in a standard deck are placed on the playing field, some on top of others, and the player is asked to remove them. While cards can be removed one by one, the game gives bonus points for removing cards in sets (multiples of the same rank) and straights (cards removed in descending order). It gives an even greater bonus for a straight flush (cards in descending order with the same suit). Cards can be removed into one of two boxes by swiping left or right.
title: 52 Pickup Plus

description:
Jogo de Saltar is a one button tap action game based on a sketch of popular Portuguese comedy series Bruno Aleixo. Heavily inspired by Street Fighter II: The World Warrior (the game originally played in the sketch) the player takes on the role of a Blanka-like character with a Wookie-like design as they dodge blasts thrown at them by a muscled representation of the sketch's co-protagonist.

Gameplay consists of tapping the screen to jump to avoid energy blasts thrown at the player at random intervals. There's a counter at the top of the screen and with each successful dodge +1 is added to it. The game keeps track of the highest score the player has with the stated goal being to "beat your personal best". Each increase in score increases the speed of the energy blast thrown making dodging harder. At random, lines from the licensed character, performed by their original voice actor can be heard as gameplay progresses.

Upon death the player is presented with a link to a newsletter and given the option to subscribe to it. This is the sole purpose of the game as it was released to promote this newsletter. The link leads to a 404 page as the page has since been moved to a different url.

sample_screenshots.caption: The player jumps above an energy blast thrown at them thus avoiding death. Above the score displays 26. From the screenshots at the official page on google playstore.
The screenshot displays the title screen of the game. From the screenshots at the official page on google playstore.
An energy blast is thrown at the player. Above the score displays 26. From the screenshots at the official page on google playstore-

title: Jogo de Saltar

description: Sounds of the Magic Forest is a sound book for babies, toddlers and children between two and six years. Playfully, the little ones discover the sounds of different animals. A sound can be played for each animal. Forest sounds accompany the scenery. There is also a short text for each picture that can be read aloud by the parents and encourages interactivity. The short texts are also suitable for reading beginners to practise reading.
title: Sounds of the Magic Forest

description: This is a special edition of The Sims 3 released exclusively for T-Mobile customers who purchased the Samsung Vibrant phone. This version came preloaded with 15 theme packs and also included exclusive T-Mobile-branded items.
title: The Sims 3: Collector's Edition for T-Mobile Samsung Vibrant

description: Set in the Maltese city of Żejtun, the player solves puzzles in the form of rotating the gears for a limited number times within a time limit in order to trigger the gems to shine. In addition to hundreds of regular levels, the player can also play a plethora of unique challenge levels.
title: Zejturn

description: Entering the magical world of Mergeland, a little girl called Alice is met with the White Queen and her Tweedle Brothers to help her in her journey. The journey consists of merging objects together to make newer ones. Larger variety and better access around the land requires the player to earn experience and gain levels. In the inventory, the player can have the number of workers to do manual labor, energy to carry out object making processes, keys to unlock parts of the land, and coins and gems to make purchases. Some encounters require the player to solve a ring puzzle. Occasionally the player will travel to a different land with its own set of puzzles and variety of objects.
title: Mergeland Alice's Adventure

description: Legends Arcana is a single-player action RPG. Explore ruins, dungeons, caves, tombs, and temples looking for gold and dodging traps while fighting your way through waves of monsters. The gameplay is fast, but has tactical elements based on 24 skills you can learn and improve. The story is told through comic-like cut-scenes.
title: Legends Arcana

description:
Hot Cyber Babes is a hentai-themed, free-to-play role-playing strategy game set in a far future where an advanced human city-state has been destroyed by intelligent robots named "Gaia". The player controls a human commander who was killed during the attack but was resurrected by his allies to continue the fight and rebuild the city.

The gameplay primarily consists of using resources to rebuild the destroyed city as well as managing and recruiting troops to battle the enemy robots. During the battles, which are seen from a side-view perspective, the player controls their team of characters while harnessing each member's unique skills to defeat the enemy team. Completing Chapter Goals, Quests, and Daily Tasks grants items that the player can use to strengthen their city and receive rewards. A dating system allows the player to go on dates with the female characters they have recruited and give them gifts to raise their intimacy level, unlocking sex scenes. The game features Japanese voice acting for the female characters.
title: Hot Cyber Babes

description: Random Adventure Roguelike II is a tribute to the old school text adventures mixed with some roguelike and RPG elements. It has (almost) no graphics, and generates random islands full of quests, items, monsters, and secrets to discover.
title: Random Adventure Roguelike II

description: Melon Maker is a Suika Game variant where you drop various fruits on top of each other, combining smaller ones (smallest being blueberry, then strawberry, etc.) into bigger ones until the watermelon, which is the biggest.

sample_screenshots.caption: Dropping blueberry on top another one to create a strawberry (ads get added at the bottom shortly after starting the game)

title: Melon Maker

description: Golf Battle is a real-time mini-golf which pits the player against several other players where each plays simultaneously. The game features many different unlockable levels which progressively up the level of difficulty. Entering competition requires coins which get awarded by playing. 1st place in a match earns you double, while last place leaves you at a loss. Later levels cost much more to compete. Each match consists of three stages which usually give you around 30 seconds to complete. Players that don't reach the hold before the time runs out end up with a penalty. Finishing first doesn't decide the winner, reaching the hold in least number of strikes, does. When more players share 1st or 2nd place, the game decides the winner by letting them make a single shot on a special level where they try to get as close as possible to the hole. Closest player to the hole wins. Various chests are awarded and unlocked by using earned red crystals. Upgrading clubs requires collecting three of the same type and then spending gold coins to upgrade one of the stats. Different clubs are used on different terrains (i.e. grass, desert, ice, etc.). Many elements in the game can also be bought using game's microtransactions.

title: Golf Battle

description:
Deadlock is a singleplayer top-down shooter which puts the player in an arena against AI-controlled opponents. The player can only move around the arena while their character attacks automatically. The objective is to survive for as long as possible.

The game features three maps and four classes to play as:

  • Yellow (bow character with a fast ranged attack but low damage)
  • Green (fights in close quarters with a sword and can block attacks with a shield; deals high damage)
  • Red (throws axes, dealing high damage)
  • Purple (throws spears which deal high damage but at a slow speed)
